rogue_1_relic_p03.usage: The SP Cost of Vanguard Operators' skills is decreased by -35%.

rogue_1_relic_p04.name: Blunt Claws - Inspiration
rogue_1_relic_p04.description: It's just a strategic retreat. That way, you can see what they look like before penetrating the enemy.
rogue_1_relic_p04.usage: The Redeployment Time of Vanguard Operators -50%.
rogue_1_relic_p04.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'The Forsaken' 3 times

rogue_1_relic_p05.name: Blunt Claws - Mastery
rogue_1_relic_p05.description: 'When the darkly-clad enemies rushed towards me, there were only four words on my mind — they are done for.'
rogue_1_relic_p05.usage: Vanguard Operators have +50% ATK and DEF
rogue_1_relic_p05.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'The Forsaken' 6 times

rogue_1_relic_p06.name: Bend Spears - Advancement
rogue_1_relic_p06.description: The soldiers stepped onto the battlefield, drew their blades, and met in battle.
rogue_1_relic_p06.usage: Guard Operators have -3 DP Cost and +40% Max HP

rogue_1_relic_p07.name: Bend Spears - Acuity
rogue_1_relic_p07.description: 'This is the 7th blade you've broken this month.' 'But I cut down eight enemies this month.'
rogue_1_relic_p07.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Frost Buck' or 'Snow Doe' 2 times

rogue_1_relic_p08.name: Bend Spears - Bloodbath
rogue_1_relic_p08.description: Soldiers who get bolder as time passes are rare. Most need some form of psychological counseling to alleviate the trauma of war.
rogue_1_relic_p08.usage: Guard Operators restore 2 SP after each attack.

rogue_1_relic_p09.name: Bend Spears - Army of One
rogue_1_relic_p09.description: One does not need to don heavy armor or hold up a shield to resist enemy attacks. Oftentimes, the best defense is to quickly eliminate those that would harm you.
rogue_1_relic_p09.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Frost Buck' or 'Snow Doe' 6 times

rogue_1_relic_p10.name: Bend Spears - Deathmatch
rogue_1_relic_p10.description: I wouldn't really recommend learning those skills from Blaze.
rogue_1_relic_p10.usage: Guard Operators have -40% DEF, but gain +40% ATK and +30 ASPD.
rogue_1_relic_p10.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Frost Buck' or 'Snow Doe' 12 times

rogue_1_relic_p11.name: Iron Guard - Advancement
rogue_1_relic_p11.description: The shieldbearers formed a mountain range and became the earth. What they fight against are not enemies of flesh and blood. They fight against fate and injustice.
rogue_1_relic_p11.usage: Defender Operators have -3 DP Cost and +40% Max HP

rogue_1_relic_p12.name: Iron Guard - Invasion
rogue_1_relic_p12.description: Defensive actions for the sake of teammates or strategic purposes often make people forget about their original aggressiveness.
rogue_1_relic_p12.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Wandering Puppet' once

rogue_1_relic_p13.name: Iron Guard - Tranquility
rogue_1_relic_p13.description: 'Is there anyone who can remain in formation under a bombing of that scale?' 'Standing in formation? He moved a few steps forward.'
rogue_1_relic_p13.usage: Defender Operators have +25% DEF and +50% Max HP

rogue_1_relic_p14.name: Iron Guard - Advance
rogue_1_relic_p14.description: In exchange for an opportunity to attack, the shattered ranks made one more advance.
rogue_1_relic_p14.usage: Defender Operators have -1 Block (will not be reduced below 1), but gain +40% ATK and +40 ASPD.
rogue_1_relic_p14.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Wandering Puppet' 3 times

rogue_1_relic_p15.name: Iron Guard - Impenetrable
rogue_1_relic_p15.description: Every blow they endure will turn into anger and be returned severalfold.
rogue_1_relic_p15.usage: Defender Operators restore 2 SP after being attacked.
rogue_1_relic_p15.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Wandering Puppet' 6 times

rogue_1_relic_p16.name: Fatal Bolts - Advancement
rogue_1_relic_p16.description: Load, aim, and fire. Destruction arrives as scheduled.
rogue_1_relic_p16.usage: Sniper Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP

rogue_1_relic_p17.name: Fatal Bolts - Precision
rogue_1_relic_p17.description: In an era when Originium Arts were not as robust as they are now, Yan had a saying, 'a pierced willow leaf from a hundred paces,' to praise others for their mastery of archery.
rogue_1_relic_p17.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Jetman' once

rogue_1_relic_p18.name: Fatal Bolts - Synergy
rogue_1_relic_p18.description: The more intimate a sniper is with her weapon, the less likely she is to be betrayed by it.
rogue_1_relic_p18.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Sniper Operators by +0.5/s

rogue_1_relic_p19.name: Fatal Bolts - Crossfire
rogue_1_relic_p19.description: The dense crossfire also exposes snipers to great danger. The next battle boils down to a game of vision.
rogue_1_relic_p19.usage: Sniper Operators have -40% HP, but gain +40% ATK.
rogue_1_relic_p19.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Jetman' 3 times

rogue_1_relic_p20.name: Fatal Bolts - Divine Speed
rogue_1_relic_p20.description: It is said that the legendary archer of ancient Victoria can almost shoot a continuous stream of arrows.
rogue_1_relic_p20.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Jetman' 6 times

rogue_1_relic_p21.name: Broken Wand - Advancement
rogue_1_relic_p21.description: Let Arts dance around your fingertips. Call the wind and rain, unravel reality, and achieve your grand goals.
rogue_1_relic_p21.usage: Caster Operators have -3 DP Cost and +60% Max HP

rogue_1_relic_p22.name: Broken Wand - Arts Weaving
rogue_1_relic_p22.description: Those who gaze up at the great spires in Leithanien often see some strange or even celestial phenomena.
rogue_1_relic_p22.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Lost Colossus' once

rogue_1_relic_p23.name: Broken Wand - Chanting
rogue_1_relic_p23.description: Though the relationship between music and Arts is marvelous indeed, umm, this is not an excuse for some peoples' tone-deafness.

rogue_1_relic_p24.name: Broken Wand - Concentration
rogue_1_relic_p24.description: 'When a caster intends to go all out, they will display a completely different temperament — even if we're talking about something like Miss Skyfire's grumpiness.'
rogue_1_relic_p24.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Caster Operators by +0.4/s
rogue_1_relic_p24.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Lost Colossus' 3 times

rogue_1_relic_p25.name: Broken Wand - Malediction
rogue_1_relic_p25.description: It is virtually impossible to identify when the Sarkaz first encountered Originium, and the origins of these ancient Arts have long been separated from actual reality and common sense.
rogue_1_relic_p25.usage: Caster Operators have -40% HP, but deal +70% Arts damage
rogue_1_relic_p25.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat Boss 'Lost Colossus' 6 times

rogue_1_relic_p26.name: Stalwart Aid - Advancement
rogue_1_relic_p26.description: Whenever you're 'almost done' with a task, what you need at that moment is someone to help you with the 'almost' part.
rogue_1_relic_p26.usage: Supporter Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP

rogue_1_relic_p27.name: Stalwart Aid - Secondary Front
rogue_1_relic_p27.description: 'Um, I can understand the derivatives of combining mechanics with Originium Arts, but there might be something else...'
rogue_1_relic_p27.usage: Units summoned by Supporter Operators have +50% ATK.
rogue_1_relic_p27.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Teller of Tales' event 2 times.

rogue_1_relic_p28.name: Stalwart Aid - Diligence
rogue_1_relic_p28.description: Operators tend to give it their all, even to tasks that might seem trivial. The reality is, those tasks are not trivial at all.
rogue_1_relic_p28.usage: The SP Cost of Supporter Operators' skills is decreased by -40%.

rogue_1_relic_p29.name: Stalwart Aid - Demoralize
rogue_1_relic_p29.description: There are many ways to weaken an enemy's offensive capabilities: corroding their weapons, psychological warfare, increasing their weight, and... giving them a stomachache.
rogue_1_relic_p29.usage: Enemies within the attack range of Supporter Operators have -15% ATK.
rogue_1_relic_p29.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Teller of Tales' event 8 times

rogue_1_relic_p30.name: Stalwart Aid - Counter-Arts
rogue_1_relic_p30.description: There are many ways to weaken an enemy's defensive capabilities: positional devices, armor-stripping Arts, marking weak points, and... giving them a stomachache.
rogue_1_relic_p30.usage: Enemies within the attack range of Supporter Operators have -20% DEF and -20% RES.
rogue_1_relic_p30.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Teller of Tales' event 16 times

rogue_1_relic_p31.name: Healer's Path - Advancement
rogue_1_relic_p31.description: The desire to save lives is a virtue that mankind must applaud, for that is the support that keeps us alive.
rogue_1_relic_p31.usage: Medic Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP

rogue_1_relic_p32.name: Healer's Path - Self-Treating
rogue_1_relic_p32.description: Who says healers can't heal themselves? They simply pop some pills before continuing to help others.
rogue_1_relic_p32.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Medic Operators by +0.3/s
rogue_1_relic_p32.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp' event 2 times.

rogue_1_relic_p33.name: Healer's Path - Potency
rogue_1_relic_p33.description: Nobody else dared to attempt such a radical treatment — except Warfarin. She never made a single mistake.

rogue_1_relic_p34.name: Healer's Path - Keen Hands
rogue_1_relic_p34.description: Compared to the feat of snatching a life from the grip of death, what is three days of coma afterwards?
rogue_1_relic_p34.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp event 8 times

rogue_1_relic_p35.name: Healer's Path - Restore Sanity
rogue_1_relic_p35.description: Reinforce your thinking. In the domain of your mind, make even every weed impregnable.
rogue_1_relic_p35.usage: Allied units within the attack range of Medic Operators gain Resistance.
rogue_1_relic_p35.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp' event 16 times

rogue_1_relic_p36.name: Rusted Blade - Advancement
rogue_1_relic_p36.description: There may be many means, but only one end.
rogue_1_relic_p36.usage: Specialist Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% Max HP

rogue_1_relic_p37.name: Rusted Blade - Execution
rogue_1_relic_p37.description: Projekt Red has a knife. She has a knife.
rogue_1_relic_p37.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Kind Puppet' event 2 times

rogue_1_relic_p38.name: Rusted Blade - Isolation
rogue_1_relic_p38.description: The director of S.W.E.E.P. does not have any mission participation records. *None*.
rogue_1_relic_p38.usage: Specialist Operators have +40% ATK and DEF

rogue_1_relic_p39.name: Rusted Blade - No Man's Land
rogue_1_relic_p39.description: Some operators have very peculiar combat methods. Don't make a fuss over how many times you see them, or how many of them you see.
rogue_1_relic_p39.usage: The Redeployment Time of Specialist Operators -35%.
rogue_1_relic_p39.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Kind Puppet' event 8 times

rogue_1_relic_p40.name: Rusted Blade - Overwhelm
rogue_1_relic_p40.description: Terrain is one aspect of battle... That's all I can say.
rogue_1_relic_p40.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Kind Puppet' event 16 times

rogue_1_relic_p41.name: Hand of Spikes
rogue_1_relic_p41.description: Let the enemy make his move. He will be his own downfall.
rogue_1_relic_p41.usage: Protector, Arts Protector, and Duelist Operators deal Arts damage equal to 100% of their own DEF on enemy units they block

rogue_1_relic_p42.name: Hand of Choker
rogue_1_relic_p42.description: With your last strength, break open a last bit of hope for yourself.
rogue_1_relic_p42.usage: Heavyshooter, Deadeye, and Besieger Operators' attacks will defeat all non-Boss enemy units at 30% or less HP

rogue_1_relic_p43.name: Hand of Buckler
rogue_1_relic_p43.description: Drop by drop, bit by bit. It is unstoppable.
rogue_1_relic_p43.usage: Decel Binder, Hexer, and Abjurer Operators' attacks deal extra Arts damage equal to 3% of the target's HP

rogue_1_relic_p44.name: Hand of Diffusion
rogue_1_relic_p44.description: The more enemies you strike, the more power you take hold of.
rogue_1_relic_p44.usage: Splash Caster, Chain Caster, and Blast Caster Operators recover 2 SP every time they attack an enemy unit

rogue_1_relic_p45.name: Hand of Shredder
rogue_1_relic_p45.description: Tear it all apart. Their armor is nothing but cloth in your hands.
rogue_1_relic_p45.usage: Dreadnought, Swordmaster, and Instructor Operators' attacks ignore 70% of target's DEF

rogue_1_relic_p46.name: Hand of Superspeed
rogue_1_relic_p46.description: You swing your hand, leaving not even an afterimage.
rogue_1_relic_p46.usage: Executor, Ambusher, and Dollkeeper Operators gain +100 ASPD when there are no friendly units in the eight adjacent tiles

rogue_1_relic_p47.name: Hand of Snatcher
rogue_1_relic_p47.description: Whatever it is you do not have, snatch it away from your enemy. There is no need to hesitate.
rogue_1_relic_p47.usage: Charger, Pioneer, and Tactician Operators' DP Cost -12 and gain 6 additional DP after defeating an enemy

rogue_1_relic_q01.name: Blue Silk Scarf
rogue_1_relic_q01.description: A lady's elegant scarf. Her appearance is a sign that it is safe here.
rogue_1_relic_q01.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, earn a total of 50 Hope.

rogue_1_relic_q02.name: Red Bow Tie
rogue_1_relic_q02.description: The first present Phantom gave Ms. Christine. She is really fond of it.
rogue_1_relic_q02.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, earn a total of 150 Hope.

rogue_1_relic_q03.name: Weird Flute
rogue_1_relic_q03.description: A weird-looking flute. Someone plays it day in and day out.

rogue_1_relic_q04.name: Glass Bird
rogue_1_relic_q04.description: 'In this paradise of mine, the bird will sing forever and ever.'

rogue_1_relic_q05.name: Solo Music Box
rogue_1_relic_q05.description: An old music box. The music does not play when the box is opened, nor does the figure inside show any signs it is about to move. There is not a peep, and no one is breaking out in dance. Before she begins her performances with Phantom, the lead actress stares blankly into the music box.
rogue_1_relic_q05.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 8 Hope remaining.

rogue_1_relic_q06.name: Originium Iris
rogue_1_relic_q06.description: A most extravagant bouquet of flowers. The troupe leader has handed flowers like these to the leads during countless curtain calls.
rogue_1_relic_q06.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 60 Max Hope.

rogue_1_relic_q07.name: Pure Gold Expedition
rogue_1_relic_q07.description: The regent departed from the wastelands, and markets rose from beneath her dress like sprouts budding in the spring. The road of prosperity connected high mountains and dense forests, following her until she disappeared beyond the cliffs overlooking the western waves. —Ancient Sargon Fairy Tale
rogue_1_relic_q07.usage: Hope +4, Squad Size Limit +1, Deployment Limit +1

rogue_1_relic_q08.name: 'Durin Overground'
rogue_1_relic_q08.description: In this expedition account, we get a glimpse of how those who live underground see those who live on the surface.
rogue_1_relic_q08.usage: Gain 1 Temporary Life Point at the beginning of each battle.
rogue_1_relic_q08.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, lose a total of 50 Life Points

rogue_1_relic_q09.name: 'Gaulish Toponym Origins'
rogue_1_relic_q09.description: A book of historical place names that Mint dug out of the Doctor's office. Calais-Blason is mentioned in the book.
rogue_1_relic_q09.usage: Gain 2 Temporary Life Points at the beginning of each battle.
rogue_1_relic_q09.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, lose a total of 125 Life Points

rogue_1_relic_q10.name: Ancient Gaulish Silver Coin
rogue_1_relic_q10.description: A coin once circulated in the now fallen nation 'Gaul.' It is in very good shape, making it highly valuable as a collector's item.

rogue_1_relic_q11.name: Élysée Purse
rogue_1_relic_q11.description: A purse used by high-class ladies who shop on the Élysée. Mousse has a purse like this.
rogue_1_relic_q11.unlockCondDesc: Clear the 3rd Floor, 'Homeland Remnants,' with no fewer than 15 Life Points remaining

rogue_1_relic_q12.name: Bank of Gaul Check
rogue_1_relic_q12.description: An extravagant checkbook plated in gold and silver. Can no longer be cashed.

rogue_1_relic_q13.name: 'Second Economic Reform Act'
rogue_1_relic_q13.description: With this bill as the starting point, Gaul formally began its path to become a hegemonic empire.

rogue_1_relic_q14.name: Vanilla Soda
rogue_1_relic_q14.description: Bolívar's cheap specialty drink dates back hundreds of years. It is mixed with a variety of spices, and is known for not being very good.
rogue_1_relic_q14.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.2/s

rogue_1_relic_q15.name: Ball Juice
rogue_1_relic_q15.description: They call it fruit juice, but it's actually alcohol. The bottle itself states that minors are forbidden from drinking it. Its Victorian place of origin once fell within Gaul's territory.
rogue_1_relic_q15.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.25/s
rogue_1_relic_q15.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Ranged Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_1_relic_q16.name: Fowlbeast Liver Pate
rogue_1_relic_q16.description: A small jar of fowlbeast liver pâté. Bright and vividly colorful, it is eaten only by nobles.
rogue_1_relic_q16.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.35/s

rogue_1_relic_q17.name: Dreaming Essence
rogue_1_relic_q17.description: Supposedly the Banshees make their aromatics only for their beloved. A single drop is enough to enchant just about anyone, bringing out any artist's inspiration and creativity.
rogue_1_relic_q17.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.5/s

rogue_1_relic_q18.name: Barrens Tequila
rogue_1_relic_q18.description: A cheap distilled spirit originally produced in Bolívar. It has a strong taste and is widely praised by Columbia's explorers.
rogue_1_relic_q18.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 3.5s.

rogue_1_relic_q19.name: Captain Morgan's Wine
rogue_1_relic_q19.description: A wine produced in the Iberian region. Despite having gained popularity in the heart of Victoria's bustling cities, it is now discontinued.
rogue_1_relic_q19.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 3s.
rogue_1_relic_q19.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Destruction Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_1_relic_q20.name: Water of Life
rogue_1_relic_q20.description: The strongest Ursus liquors go straight to one's head, but it's said that the healthy Ursusian adult can down several bottles.
rogue_1_relic_q20.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 2.5s.

rogue_1_relic_q21.name: Royal Liqueur
rogue_1_relic_q21.description: The fine wines of the extinct country, Gaul, have now become expensive, prime treasures for collectors. The place of production is now a part of Leithanien, but the technique has been lost.
rogue_1_relic_q21.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 1.5s.

rogue_1_relic_q22.name: 'Unleashings'
rogue_1_relic_q22.description: After multiple tries, Touch naturally opens up to you, albeit temporarily.
rogue_1_relic_q22.usage: All Operators recover 1 SP every time they take damage or Elemental Damage
rogue_1_relic_q22.unlockCondDesc: Clear the battle, 'Fatal Melodies,' without losing any Life Point

rogue_1_relic_q23.name: 'Renowned Singer'
rogue_1_relic_q23.description: Who cares what it's singing? Make it stop! It's hurting my ears!
rogue_1_relic_q23.usage: Enemies receive 600 Arts Damage per second when stunned, frozen, or bound

rogue_1_relic_q24.name: String Puppet
rogue_1_relic_q24.description: The more you struggle and try to break free, the tighter the strings get. Do you really think you are still thinking rationally?
rogue_1_relic_q24.usage: Enemies receive 700 Arts Damage per second when stunned, frozen, or bound
rogue_1_relic_q24.unlockCondDesc: Clear the battle, A Cold Separation,' without losing any Life Point

rogue_1_relic_q25.name: 'Children's Puppet'
rogue_1_relic_q25.description: A simple puppet made by Iberian children using trinkets found on the seacoast. Supposedly just holding it tight will give you much richer dreams.
rogue_1_relic_q25.usage: Enemies receive 1000 Arts Damage per second when stunned, frozen, or bound

rogue_1_relic_q26.name: Coin-Operated Toy
rogue_1_relic_q26.description: No idea why anyone would like a design like this, but its overall concept is indeed praiseworthy—Just insert a coin, and even a statue will start moving. There is nothing truer in this world.
rogue_1_relic_q26.usage: For each 5 Originium Ingots in possession, all friendly units have +3 ASPD
rogue_1_relic_q26.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, spend a total of 100 Originium Ingots at shops

rogue_1_relic_q27.name: Chivalric Commandments - New Edition
rogue_1_relic_q27.description: Taking solemn vows is a thing of the past. The spirit of modern knighthood requires more flexible displays. Go ahead and input your number in the communications device, and you too will be an honorary knight.
rogue_1_relic_q27.usage: For each 5 Originium Ingots in possession, all friendly units have +5 ASPD
rogue_1_relic_q27.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, spend a total of 300 Originium Ingots at shops

rogue_1_relic_q28.name: Golden Chalice
rogue_1_relic_q28.description: Saints, knights, and pietists. All of them are madmen. Dear God, even the chalice itself is made of pure gold!
rogue_1_relic_q28.usage: For each 5 Originium Ingots in possession, all friendly units have +7 ASPD
rogue_1_relic_q28.unlockCondDesc: In the 'Prospective Investment System,' reach an Investment Reserve Balance of 325

rogue_1_relic_q29.name: Spinach Pack
rogue_1_relic_q29.description: Many Cautus out there believe that popping the contents of this can into their mouths will grant them immense strength. The marketing's effectiveness is a classic success story in the industry.
rogue_1_relic_q29.usage: All friendly units have +60% ATK for one second after their skill becomes active

rogue_1_relic_q30.name: No. 073 Safety Reagent
rogue_1_relic_q30.description: A perfectly safe product of a cautiously controlled experiment. Perfectly safe, definitely will not explode, and keeps your mind at ease.
rogue_1_relic_q30.usage: All friendly units have +65% ATK for one second after their skill becomes active
rogue_1_relic_q30.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, insert coins at least 15 times in the 'Tiny Stage' event

rogue_1_relic_q31.name: Wrath of Siracusans
rogue_1_relic_q31.description: The signature pasta dish of an 'authentic Siracusan restaurant' that once operated in the capital of Gaul. The dish's unique taste, and particularly its sauce, a blend of thick chocolate sauce and Originium Slug liver, earned the praise of many Gaulish nobles. Supposedly, though, this dish nearly caused a diplomatic crisis between Siracusa and Gaul.
rogue_1_relic_q31.usage: All friendly units have +100% ATK for one second after their skill becomes active

rogue_1_relic_q33.name: Ribbon of Honor
rogue_1_relic_q33.description: Numerous actors have played this character, yet none of them were able to save the character's dearest friend.
rogue_1_relic_q33.usage: All friendly units have +100% ATK when blocking only one enemy

rogue_1_relic_q34.name: 'Loyality'
rogue_1_relic_q34.description: What is loyalty, and what is righteousness? A group of people found the answer several decades ago.
rogue_1_relic_q34.usage: All friendly units recover 150 HP per second when blocking three or more enemies
rogue_1_relic_q34.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, insert coins at least 50 times in the 'Tiny Stage' event

rogue_1_relic_q35.name: 'End of Times'
rogue_1_relic_q35.description: As long as a new cycle has not been reached, there is still time to fix your mistakes.
rogue_1_relic_q35.usage: For one time only during any battle prior to the final battle of the area, gain 1 Life Point and continue onto the next step instead of concluding the exploration upon mission failure
rogue_1_relic_q35.unlockCondDesc: In a single battle, lose a total of 8 Life Points (including mission failures)

rogue_1_relic_q36.name: Royal Alliance Treaty
rogue_1_relic_q36.description: The old Sarkaz courts sacrificed themselves to obtain their power. Ever since, the courts have come to terms with one another, banding together against their common enemy.
rogue_1_relic_q36.usage: All friendly units no longer receive any damage from Sarkaz enemies
rogue_1_relic_q36.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, allow 15 [Sarkaz] enemies to enter the Objective Point

rogue_1_relic_q37.name: Condensed Suppressant
rogue_1_relic_q37.description: A medical reagent developed by Rhodes Island to suppress acute Oripathy infections. However, further enrichment of the reagent's concentration will cause irreversible damage to the infection site.
rogue_1_relic_q37.usage: All friendly units increase their ATK to 150% and silence the enemy for 3 seconds when attacking [Infected Creatures]
rogue_1_relic_q37.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, allow a total of 400 'Infected Creature' enemies escape

rogue_1_relic_r01.name: Hot Water Kettle
rogue_1_relic_r01.description: Some people often use the hot water kettle in the Rhodes Island Office to cook instant noodles in the middle of the night. That's not a very healthy lifestyle...
rogue_1_relic_r01.usage: Immediately gain +2 Life Points and +1 Hope

rogue_1_relic_r02.name: Special Suppressor
rogue_1_relic_r02.description: An enhanced suppressor developed by Rhodes Island that can better keep the infected from losing control of their Originium Arts.

rogue_1_relic_r03.name: Stone Gargoyle
rogue_1_relic_r03.description: A palm-sized sculpture. Supposedly they are handmade gifts given out by the Gargoyles as a sign of friendship.

rogue_1_relic_r04.name: Vampire's Bed
rogue_1_relic_r04.description: A lavish-looking coffin that matches the castle's aesthetics well. However, Warfarin says this is merely a stereotype.

rogue_1_relic_r05.name: Proof of Longevity
rogue_1_relic_r05.description:
A tree branch that has withered and flourished. 
When it is withered, it grows anew. When it is thriving in its fullest, it fades away yet again.

rogue_1_relic_r06.name: Pried Open Toolbox
rogue_1_relic_r06.description: The tool box of the troupe's prop master. From nails to dummy props, it has everything.

rogue_1_relic_r07.name: Antiquated Sheet Music
rogue_1_relic_r07.description: A tattered piece of sheet music. The notes can no longer be clearly read. No one knows for certain what story this piece was meant to tell.

rogue_1_relic_r08.name: Letter of Termination Contract
rogue_1_relic_r08.description: You can break free of this troupe with just one autograph.
rogue_1_relic_r08.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 30 Operators

rogue_1_relic_r09.name: Universal Key
rogue_1_relic_r09.description: An old, silver key. It can open any door. As the keeper, the troupe's butler naturally needs a key that unlocks all the secrets here.

rogue_1_relic_r10.name: Banshee's Kiss
rogue_1_relic_r10.description: Outsiders make extraordinary displays of bravery that far surpass their normal abilities. However, as one of the few male Banshees out there, this has become a far too common sight to Logos.

rogue_1_relic_r11.name: Antique Coins
rogue_1_relic_r11.description: An ancient, rusty coin, weathered to the point where one can no longer identify its age. Things like these are all too common throughout Terra's barrens.

rogue_1_relic_r12.name: Actor's Jewelry Box
rogue_1_relic_r12.description: A box containing all kinds of shattered jewelries. The young lead actress wore these jewelries and stepped onto the stage, in the end falling from its highest point.
rogue_1_relic_r12.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Support Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_1_relic_r13.name: Flawless Jadestone
rogue_1_relic_r13.description: Even though it thrice brought the city to ruins, it yet shines radiantly in its flawless form. Even today, the Sargon emperor in possession of the gem has yet to find another piece of jewelry matching its brilliance, leaving it with naught but gunsmoke for a companion.
rogue_1_relic_r13.unlockCondDesc: In the 'Prospective Investment System,' reach an Investment Reserve Balance of 100

rogue_1_relic_r14.name: Laughing Joker
rogue_1_relic_r14.usage: Immediately Promote an Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r15.name: Ms. Christine Petting Ticket
rogue_1_relic_r15.usage: Immediately Promote 2 Operators (Does not require Hope).
rogue_1_relic_r15.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 15 Operators

rogue_1_relic_r16.name: Antique Casting
rogue_1_relic_r16.description: 'Harken the forge of the sky Awaits five earthborn metals' ...Even though it can be used for all kinds of work, nobody understands its exact mechanism.
rogue_1_relic_r16.usage: Immediately Promote 3 Operators (Does not require Hope).
rogue_1_relic_r16.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 35 Operators

rogue_1_relic_r17.name: Blunt Claws - Training
rogue_1_relic_r17.description: A formidable set of equipment to provide strength, an indomitable heart to press forward bravely.
rogue_1_relic_r17.usage: Immediately Promote a Vanguard Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r18.name: Bend Spears - Training
rogue_1_relic_r18.description: Some people use swords because they don't know how to use crossbows or Arts. Others use swords because that's all they need.
rogue_1_relic_r18.usage: Immediately Promote a Guard Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r19.name: Iron Guard - Training
rogue_1_relic_r19.description: Scars symbolize glory, but who will remember the soldiers who were cut a bit too deeply?
rogue_1_relic_r19.usage: Immediately Promote a Defender Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r20.name: Fatal Bolts - Training
rogue_1_relic_r20.description: 'Either you learn to control your ignition, or you learn to discern your target. Got it?'
rogue_1_relic_r20.usage: Immediately Promote a Sniper Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r21.name: Broken Wand - Training
rogue_1_relic_r21.description: After watching the 'performance' of certain casters, I decided to quietly put away the Leithanian textbook.'
rogue_1_relic_r21.usage: Immediately Promote a Caster Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r22.name: Stalwart Aid - Training
rogue_1_relic_r22.description: Their tactics are always diverse and colorful.
rogue_1_relic_r22.usage: Immediately Promote a Supporter Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r23.name: Healer's Path - Training
rogue_1_relic_r23.description: When the day comes when everyone is a doctor and can even cure the disease known as life, we will no longer need doctors.
rogue_1_relic_r23.usage: Immediately Promote a Medic Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r24.name: Rusted Blade - Training
rogue_1_relic_r24.description: When conducting live combat drills with Specialist Operators, please be prepared to be 'beaten up thoroughly before you are prepared.'
rogue_1_relic_r24.usage: Immediately Promote a Specialist Operator (Does not require Hope).

rogue_1_relic_r25.name: Regional Action Plan
rogue_1_relic_r25.description: Rhodes Island has established dedicated offices in every important hub area. The messengers are doing what they can to weave a fragile web across this land.

rogue_1_relic_r26.name: Comprehensive Operation File
rogue_1_relic_r26.description: A vessel sailing upon the land, like treading upon thin ice. Remember to always expand your worldview.

rogue_1_relic_r27.name: Secret HR Letter
rogue_1_relic_r27.description: '■■■ gave this to you? Guess there's no problem then.'

rogue_1_relic_r28.name: Draft of a Speech
rogue_1_relic_r28.description: She was a little nervous, a little worried, but still remained resolute. When the microphone was turned on, her long ears quivered slightly.
rogue_1_relic_r28.usage: All Operators cost -2 Hope to recruit
rogue_1_relic_r28.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 15 Operators.

rogue_1_relic_r29.name: Crimson Troupe Ticket Stub
rogue_1_relic_r29.description: A Crimson Troupe ticket stub. None of the cast are listed. What kind of performance do they have in store for you?
rogue_1_relic_r29.usage: 25% chance to drop an additional Recruitment Voucher after battle

rogue_1_relic_r30.name: Lucky Coin
rogue_1_relic_r30.description: A coin picked up from Rhodes Island. If you find one, you're sure to be able to find many more.
rogue_1_relic_r30.usage: Gain +2 Originium Ingots upon entering a noncombat node.
rogue_1_relic_r30.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, enter a total of 40 non-combat nodes.

rogue_1_relic_r31.name: Masquerade Mask
rogue_1_relic_r31.description: Esteemed guests, welcome to the Crimson Troupe. The performance we have in store for you tonight will be one to remember.
rogue_1_relic_r31.usage: Gain +3 Originium Ingots upon entering a noncombat node.
rogue_1_relic_r31.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, enter a total of 100 non-combat nodes.

rogue_1_relic_r32.name: Supreme Ring
rogue_1_relic_r32.description: In Leithanian mythology, he who holds the ring enjoys the vast riches of the entire world, but greed will also be his undoing.
rogue_1_relic_r32.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 50 Originium Ingots remaining.

rogue_1_relic_r33.name: Victorian 'Scrap' Medal
rogue_1_relic_r33.description: A knight's medal that Siege threw together and awarded to Dagda on the spot. The materials used are pitiful, but it holds a lot of meaning to Dagda.
rogue_1_relic_r33.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, clear a total of 10 battles.

rogue_1_relic_r34.name: Leithanian Medal of Honor
rogue_1_relic_r34.description: The twin empresses rarely do anything together, but conferring awards on those who create art is one such thing.
rogue_1_relic_r34.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, clear a total of 50 battles.

rogue_1_relic_r35.name: Rusted Iron Hammer
rogue_1_relic_r35.description: 'Change is necessary, and we must do all we can to hasten the oncoming storm.'
rogue_1_relic_r35.usage: Shop vendors charge -50% Originium Ingots for their goods.

rogue_1_relic_r36.name: Four-Leaf Clover Fossil
rogue_1_relic_r36.description: A symbol of luck that Magallan found in a place all but devoid of life. The rock has no doubt experienced many violent changes of the lands, but it survived, giving those who come across it a small bit of lingering hope.
rogue_1_relic_r36.usage: Gain an additional choice when collectibles are dropped after battle

rogue_1_relic_r37.name: Assault Co-op Expansion
rogue_1_relic_r37.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
rogue_1_relic_r37.usage: Vanguard Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
rogue_1_relic_r37.unlockCondDesc: Win a battle while having at least 4 Vanguard Operators.

rogue_1_relic_r38.name: Assault Co-op Reinforcements
rogue_1_relic_r38.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
rogue_1_relic_r38.usage: Guard Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
rogue_1_relic_r38.unlockCondDesc: Win a battle while having at least 4 Guard Operators.

rogue_1_relic_r39.name: Fortification Co-op Expansion
rogue_1_relic_r39.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
rogue_1_relic_r39.usage: Defender Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
rogue_1_relic_r39.unlockCondDesc: Win a battle while having at least 4 Defender Operators.

rogue_1_relic_r40.name: Fortification Co-op Reinforcements
rogue_1_relic_r40.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
rogue_1_relic_r40.usage: Supporter Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
rogue_1_relic_r40.unlockCondDesc: Win a battle while having at least 4 Supporter Operators.

rogue_1_relic_r41.name: Ranged Co-op Expansion
rogue_1_relic_r41.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
rogue_1_relic_r41.usage: Medic Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
rogue_1_relic_r41.unlockCondDesc: Win a battle while having at least 3 Medic Operators.

rogue_1_relic_r42.name: Ranged Co-op Reinforcements
rogue_1_relic_r42.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
rogue_1_relic_r42.usage: Sniper Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
rogue_1_relic_r42.unlockCondDesc: Win a battle while having at least 4 Sniper Operators.

rogue_1_relic_r43.name: Sabotage Co-op Expansion
rogue_1_relic_r43.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
rogue_1_relic_r43.usage: Caster Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
rogue_1_relic_r43.unlockCondDesc: Win a battle while having at least 4 Caster Operators.

rogue_1_relic_r44.name: Sabotage Co-op Reinforcements
rogue_1_relic_r44.description: It is difficult to gain the upper hand in frontline combat with only a single squad of Operators. Supplementing combat capabilities through Co-ops is an effective solution.
rogue_1_relic_r44.usage: Specialist Rec. Vouchers obtained from Shops or as a drop will be upgraded into Elite HR Dispatch Letters.
rogue_1_relic_r44.unlockCondDesc: Win a battle while having at least 4 Specialist Operators.

rogue_1_relic_sp01.name: King's New Lance
rogue_1_relic_sp01.description: Beautiful wishes made in dire straits can bring hope, even if they are not necessarily the truth.
rogue_1_relic_sp01.usage: When Life Point is 1, all friendly units have +50 ASPD
rogue_1_relic_sp01.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, obtain 30 victories with 1 Life Point remaining

rogue_1_relic_sp02.name: Guard Cap
rogue_1_relic_sp02.description: 'You and I will cease one day, but our country is everlasting.'
rogue_1_relic_sp02.usage: For a single battle, all friendly units have +25% HP each time they are deployed
rogue_1_relic_sp02.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 200 Operators deployed in battle

rogue_1_relic_sp03.name: 'Painful Happiness'
rogue_1_relic_sp03.description: Oripathy is spreading among the troupe members. Some collapsed, some broke out crying, some were overjoyed, and some turned their attention to writing. It was at such a time that the young man received his coming-of-age present. He will sing his very last song as an actor.
rogue_1_relic_sp03.usage: All enemy units have -15% HP and Movement Speed

rogue_1_relic_sp04.name: Castle's Offspring
rogue_1_relic_sp04.description: With enough time, this box will become a whole new stage.
rogue_1_relic_sp04.usage: All friendly units have +300 DEF and +30 RES 100 seconds after deployment
rogue_1_relic_sp04.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 100 Operators deployed in battle

rogue_1_relic_sp05.name: Surging Feast
rogue_1_relic_sp05.description: We've known how to indulge since birth. Do not resist your desires. Submit to them instead.
rogue_1_relic_sp05.usage: All friendly units have +30% healing effects and receive -30% Elemental Damage
rogue_1_relic_sp05.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, lose a total of 300 Life Points

rogue_1_relic_sp06.name: 'Eventide Terror'
rogue_1_relic_sp06.description: There will come a day of darkness that not even light can save. The leader of the troupe has prepared a fine wine to properly appreciate human despair.
rogue_1_relic_sp06.usage: Deals Stun on all enemy units for 5 seconds every time an enemy unit enters the Protection Objective
rogue_1_relic_sp06.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 30 Life Points lost

rogue_1_relic_sp07.name: 'Excessiveness'
rogue_1_relic_sp07.description: A gemstone without luster, just like the endless desires of the troupe's leader.
rogue_1_relic_sp07.usage: Deals 3000 True Damage on all enemy units every time an enemy unit enters the Protection Objective

rogue_1_relic_n01.name: Dance of the Condemned
rogue_1_relic_n01.description: They have trapped themselves in this place. Ah, peace and quiet. No one can interrupt this creation now.
rogue_1_relic_n01.unlockCondDesc: Reach the ending once after [Expansion II]

rogue_1_relic_n02.name: Act 1
rogue_1_relic_n02.description: The end of the first act, the first ending that the young man wrote for himself. In the midst of the fire that consumed all that he treasured, the hero sips his foe's blood and writes the last scene of his vendetta.
rogue_1_relic_n02.usage: Hope +3, leads the exploration toward a different conclusion
rogue_1_relic_n02.unlockCondDesc: Reach the ending once after [Expansion II]

rogue_1_relic_n03.name: Today's Menu
rogue_1_relic_n03.description: The troupe's chef never serves the same dish twice. The members of the troupe have been warned to never ask where the ingredients came from.
rogue_1_relic_n03.usage: All allied units have +40% healing effectiveness
rogue_1_relic_n03.unlockCondDesc: Win the Emergency Operation [First Come, Last Served] without losing any Life Point

rogue_1_relic_n04.name: 'Intoxicated Hymnoi'
rogue_1_relic_n04.description: One sniff brings tears to Pallas's eyes. What spell has Lena cast on this perfume?
rogue_1_relic_n04.usage: All allied units recover 2% of Max HP per second

rogue_1_relic_n05.name: Empresses' Wish
rogue_1_relic_n05.description: The Twin Empresses tower above. When dawn and dusk are one, there shall be no more dissent in Leithanien.
rogue_1_relic_n05.usage: All allied units have +15% Physical and Arts Dodge

rogue_1_relic_n06.name: Victory Horn
rogue_1_relic_n06.description: Blow the horn, cry out, and scatter our foes with its roar!
rogue_1_relic_n06.usage: Duration of single instance status effects such as stun, cold or freeze is increased by 100%

rogue_1_relic_n07.name: Flash Camera
rogue_1_relic_n07.description: Every photo shot by this camera is washed out in white, with only the victim's twisted expression faintly visible.
rogue_1_relic_n07.usage: Duration of single instance status effects such as stun, cold or freeze is increased by 110%
rogue_1_relic_n07.unlockCondDesc: Win the Emergency Operation [Alpine Visitor] without losing any Life Point

rogue_1_relic_n08.name: Therapy Tape
rogue_1_relic_n08.description: He tried to stop you from listening. He said it was dangerous. He said you should not stay. Do you understand now? You are listening to his song.
rogue_1_relic_n08.usage: Duration of single instance status effects such as stun, cold or freeze is increased by 150%

rogue_1_relic_n09.name: Royal Brooch
rogue_1_relic_n09.description: An ornament worn by Gaulish royalty, made from gold and inlaid with expensive Originium crystals. They are more than decoration: many of these brooches hide Originium circuits loaded with defensive Arts.
rogue_1_relic_n09.usage: All allied units have RES +15, and gain one-time dodge after deployment

rogue_1_relic_n10.name: 'Tear of the Departed'
rogue_1_relic_n10.description: Forged with honesty and perseverance. No flame has burned in Whitesmith's furnace ever since.
rogue_1_relic_n10.usage: All Operators gain 50% Sanctuary when affected by a negative status such as stun, cold or freeze
rogue_1_relic_n10.unlockCondDesc: Win the Emergency Operation [Sculptor and Statue] without losing any Life Point

rogue_1_relic_n11.name: Old Fan
rogue_1_relic_n11.description: When it rains for several days on end, the old Yanese Tianshi complains to his friends about the pain in his knees, before casually waving his fan and driving away the rainclouds. It is about time he taught this trick to his young apprentice, currently working at the Central Judicial Office.
rogue_1_relic_n11.usage: All Operators gain ATK +10% for every different type of Operator class in the squad
rogue_1_relic_n11.unlockCondDesc: Win the Emergency Operation [From Afar] without losing any Life Point

rogue_1_relic_n12.name: Nachzehrer's Cane
rogue_1_relic_n12.description: Nachzehrer devours life and uses it.
rogue_1_relic_n12.usage: When an allied unit is overhealed, nearby enemies take Arts damage equal to the overheal amount
rogue_1_relic_n12.unlockCondDesc: Win the Emergency Operation [Fight to the Death] without losing any Life Point

rogue_1_relic_n13.name: Angelina's Inspiration
rogue_1_relic_n13.description: The girl has no qualms about sharing her Originium Arts. She believes that you will use it for the right reasons.
rogue_1_relic_n13.usage: All enemy units have Movement Speed -15%, and their weight is reduced by one rank

rogue_1_relic_n14.name: Scout's Scope
rogue_1_relic_n14.description: Lock on, aim, fire, and destroy the enemy's will to resist, all in the name of a better future that Scout will never see. Maybe you can do it for him.
rogue_1_relic_n14.usage: Enemies take increased damage from allied units as range increases (max 100%)

rogue_1_relic_n15.name: 'Silence'
rogue_1_relic_n15.description: When the climax arrives, the actor grabs his stinging throat and holds back the roiling fire in his chest, all without a word.
rogue_1_relic_n15.usage: Allied Operators gradually gain ATK when not using a skill, up to a maximum of +60% after 60 seconds; resets when a skill expires
rogue_1_relic_n15.unlockCondDesc: Win the battle [Observation] without losing any Life Point

rogue_1_relic_n16.name: 'Focus'
rogue_1_relic_n16.description: The stage lights focus on the hero. The actor gives one last dying cry, before the curtains are brought down by Death.
rogue_1_relic_n16.usage: Whenever you deploy a unit, deal 3000 Arts damage to a random enemy and the area around it

rogue_1_relic_n17.name: Rhodes Island Tactical Transceiver
rogue_1_relic_n17.description: Hang in there, help's on the way.
rogue_1_relic_n17.usage: Gain an additional choice when Recruitment Vouchers are dropped after battle

rogue_1_relic_n18.name: Assault Co-op - Sharp Blade
rogue_1_relic_n18.description: Use the sharpest spear to strike the hardest shield. I guarantee you that the shield will break first, trust me.
rogue_1_relic_n18.usage: Increases the ATK of Vanguard and Guard Operators by +8% for each Vanguard or Guard Operator in the combat squad.

rogue_1_relic_n19.name: Assault Co-op - Skirmish
rogue_1_relic_n19.description: A sophisticated blocking technique is essential to protecting one's body.
rogue_1_relic_n19.usage: Increases the DEF of Vanguard and Guard Operators by +10% for each Vanguard or Guard Operator in the combat squad.

rogue_1_relic_n20.name: Fortification Contract - Phalanx
rogue_1_relic_n20.description: Like a huge ship running over rubble.
rogue_1_relic_n20.usage: Increases the ATK of Defender and Supporter Operators by +8% for each Defender or Supporter Operator in the combat squad.

rogue_1_relic_n21.name: Fortification Contract - Resolution
rogue_1_relic_n21.description: Use the hardest shield to block the sharpest spear. I guarantee you that the spear will break first, trust me.
rogue_1_relic_n21.usage: Increases the DEF of Defender and Supporter Operators by +10% for each Defender or Supporter Operator in the combat squad.

rogue_1_relic_n22.name: Long-Range Contract - Remote Strike
rogue_1_relic_n22.description: If you can solve the problem from a reasonable distance, why do you have to literally butt heads?
rogue_1_relic_n22.usage: Increases the ATK of Medic and Sniper Operators by +8% for each Medic or Sniper Operator in the combat squad.

rogue_1_relic_n23.name: Long-Range Contract - Assassination
rogue_1_relic_n23.description: Can't tell friends from foes at this distance? Unload a volley at them then. The foes are the ones that fail to avoid it.
rogue_1_relic_n23.usage: Increases the ASPD of Medic and Sniper Operators by +6 for each Medic or Sniper Operator in the combat squad.

rogue_1_relic_n24.name: Sabotage Co-op - Elimination
rogue_1_relic_n24.usage: Increases the ATK of Caster and Specialist Operators by +8% for each Caster or Specialist Operator in the combat squad.

rogue_1_relic_n25.name: Sabotage Co-op - Suppression
rogue_1_relic_n25.description: Don't worry about accuracy. Take enough shots, and you're guaranteed to land something!
rogue_1_relic_n25.usage: Increases the ASPD of Caster and Specialist Operators by +6 for each Caster or Specialist Operator in the combat squad.

rogue_1_active_tool_1.name: Support Replenishment Station
rogue_1_active_tool_1.description: An emergency Portable Supply Station provided to field operators.
rogue_1_active_tool_1.usage: Bring a Portable Supply Station along to each battle

rogue_1_active_tool_2.name: Support Landmine Set
rogue_1_active_tool_2.description: An emergency set of Interference Mines provided to field operators.
rogue_1_active_tool_2.usage: Bring 3 Interference Mines along to each battle

rogue_1_active_tool_3.name: Support Mr. Boom
rogue_1_active_tool_3.description: An emergency Mr. Boom provided to field operators.
rogue_1_active_tool_3.usage: Bring a Mr. Boom along to each battle

rogue_1_active_tool_4.name: Support Escape Crane
rogue_1_active_tool_4.description: An emergency Snowsant's Safe Escape Crane provided to field operators.
rogue_1_active_tool_4.usage: Bring a Snowsant's Safe Escape Crane along to each battle

rogue_1_active_tool_5.name: Support Fog Machine
rogue_1_active_tool_5.description: An emergency Fog Machine provided to field operators that appears to be broken.
rogue_1_active_tool_5.usage: Bring a Broken Fog Machine along to each battle

rogue_1_active_tool_6.name: Support Gas Tanks
rogue_1_active_tool_6.description: An emergency set of Gas Tanks P. provided to field operators.
rogue_1_active_tool_6.usage: Bring 2 Gas Tanks P. along to each battle

rogue_1_capsule_1.name: 'Ode au Triomphe'
rogue_1_capsule_1.description: Let us sing to celebrate our emperor's triumphant return! Long live the emperor! Long live Gaul!
rogue_1_capsule_1.usage: Gain 5 Temporary Life Points at the beginning of the next battle on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_2.name: 'Der Ring'
rogue_1_capsule_2.description: Leithanien's supreme treasure will never fall in the hands of the Caprinae. Not even if the tower crumbles and the masses must kill one another for it. The lakewater deep inside the forest is the resting place it has always sought.
rogue_1_capsule_2.usage: +50% Originium Ingot drops from the next battle on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_3.name: 'One Hundred and One Days'
rogue_1_capsule_3.description: Once, a commoner told a merchant a fascinating tale. The tale then spread from one person to the next, at last making it to the lord ameer after a hundred and one days. Amused by the tale, he disguised himself as a commoner to seek out its originator, only to find that he had long ago sentenced the man to death.
rogue_1_capsule_3.usage: Gain +100% Command EXP from the next battle on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_4.name: 'Lone Wander'
rogue_1_capsule_4.description: Within the crevices of the earth and under the shadows of the cities, a mysterious lone wanderer is spying. Behind his ugly iron mask lies a face of conspiracies and madness.
rogue_1_capsule_4.usage: Receive a random collectible with any purchase at the next shop on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_5.name: 'Wonderland in Dream'
rogue_1_capsule_5.description: Even if we never reach that faraway castle, you still have your allies, and I still have you.
rogue_1_capsule_5.usage: Receive a Recruitment Voucher after making a decision at the next Safe House

rogue_1_capsule_6.name: 'Frost Buck and Snow Doe'
rogue_1_capsule_6.description:
As the Snowpriest's familial bodyguards, our wish is to die by the enemy's cold iron.
As blood-related twins, our wish is to live and die together.
You have far too many wishes. I can only fulfill one of them. Allow me to pick.
rogue_1_capsule_6.usage: All friendly units have +15% ATK and HP during the next battle on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_7.name: 'Light of Heria'
rogue_1_capsule_7.description: In our moment of crisis, the heroes descended from the sun, made their way across the Heria Mountains, and arrived in Minos.
rogue_1_capsule_7.usage: A random Elite Operator will temporarily join your squad during the next Emergency Operation on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_8.name: 'Sette Colli's Mother Wolf'
rogue_1_capsule_8.description: The lessons learned from She-wolf leaving her nest show that some rules are not to be broken.
rogue_1_capsule_8.usage: All non-Boss enemy units have -50% Movement Speed during the next Emergency Operation on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_9.name: 'The Dawn'
rogue_1_capsule_9.description: A ray of light radiates forward from behind, sweeping past the clamoring cities and into the fissure between heaven and earth. Suddenly, the world is free of its early morning trance, its eyes wide open, with morning dew glimmering for all to see.
rogue_1_capsule_9.usage: Immediately gain +1 Life Point when entering the next Encounter on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_10.name: 'The Golden Fowlbeast'
rogue_1_capsule_10.description: The golden fowlbeast lays golden eggs. It spreads its golden feathers as its golden chicks squeak. It is golden, but what does it matter?
rogue_1_capsule_10.usage: Immediately gain +3 Originium Ingots when entering the next Encounter on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_11.name: 'Wild Gold'
rogue_1_capsule_11.description: 'Whatever it is you wish to do, you will need these, and the more the better.'
rogue_1_capsule_11.usage: All items cost 50% less Originium Ingots at the next shop on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_12.name: 'The Lullaby'
rogue_1_capsule_12.description: A clean, comfortable, and relaxing dreamscape all begins with a lullaby, and when you are awake, everything will be much be that much better.
rogue_1_capsule_12.usage: Doubles the rewards earned at the next Safe House on this floor

rogue_1_capsule_13.name: 'The Carnival'
rogue_1_capsule_13.description: Celebrate, friend! This doesn't happen every day!
rogue_1_capsule_13.usage: Waives the first expenditure on the next Downtime Recreation on this floor

endingDetailList.text: You let the wandering jazz player try his inspiration <color=#ffb525>{0}</color> times
In the end, he must admit he has had a taste of defeat thanks to you
You carefully admired the oil painting
You asked the person their name
You opened the doors and walked in
You listened to the old lady's stories <color=#ffb525>{0}</color> times
You dived into the heap of trash <color=#ffb525>{0}</color> times

grandPrizes.displayDiscription:
Ever so slightly, the pain of the past is excised along with her Seaborn cells.
Yet, the future is still shrouded in mist, leading her into confusion and doubt.
Highmore still does not know where to go from here.
But at the very least, she has found her starting point.

Inscribed on the stone stele 
are markings long lost to time.
Through it, the Seaborn explore the future, 
and thus, you should as well.

As described by Mizuki and his companion.
The beach hut gradually begins to take shape.
First, pop the ice-cold drinks to start the rip-roaring party, 
then play the 'ABCs of Chill' suitable for normal people.

Mizuki does not hide his identity in the company of friends.
That's why you can see him darting about from place to place, his tentacles dancing around.
Push the question of survival out of your mind.
Let us enjoy this summer vacation together.

As described by Mizuki and his companion.
The beach hut gradually begins to take shape.
Here are the 'summer accessories' that will keep you entertained, 
as well as 'beach decorations' for the vibes.

The integration of data content is the essence of systems engineering.
It can improve the abilities of operators, or assist in adjusting their combat methods.
Are you already starting to think about how to put this to use?
Or will you keep it in your back pocket, saving it for a more suitable opportunity?

A stone slate left by humans on the sea floor.
A relic upon which history is faithfully engraved.
Mother's inheritance left to her creations.
A symbol of the Seaborn's quest for survival.

The pressure to survive drives evolution, 
and evolution overcomes the dilemma of survival.
Thus, a question arises in your mind: 
Who was it who designed this cycle?

In the past and present, there may come to exist a shore that does not belong to the present.
Thus, the fourth dimension unfolds, and unseen scenes are arranged in place.
At the far end of the ocean, the darkest night faces off against the light of dawn.
And so, beyond the other side, the starry firmament awaits our decision.

monthMission.desc: Obtain a total of 35 collectible
Recruit a total of 35 Operators
Defeat a total of 500 enemies
Pass a total of 50 nodes
Complete a total of 2 Regional Commissions
Promote Operators a total of 10 times
Spend a total of 100 Originium Ingots
Raise your Command Level a total of 15 times
Clear a total of 15 floors
Purchase a total of 10 items from the Rogue Trader
Spend a total of 75 Hope through Recruitment
Recruit a total of 10 Operators through Temporary Recruitment
Roll a die a total of 20 times
Use a total of 10 keys
Pass a total of 24 Encounter nodes
Clear a total of 8 Emergency Ops nodes
Obtain a total of 4 Tactical Prop
Recruit a total of 8 Operators through Support Recruitment
Perfectly clear a total of 12 Combat Operations.
Pass a total of 8 Downtime Recreation nodes
Pass 1 Fortuitous Opportunity node
Pass a total of 4 Regional Commission nodes
Defeat a total of 4 Bosses
Defeat the Duck Lord 3 times

monthMission.taskName: The Other Side of the Sea
monthMission.desc: Clear a total of 1 ending
Invest a total of 30 Originium Ingots with the Prospective Investment System
Defeat a total of 3 Chest Seaborns
Defeat the Crying Thief a total of 3 times
Clear an entire floor after triggering the Call of We Many

month_team_1.teamDes: When the Silence invaded Iberian soil once again, someone from the ocean, from Thorns's memories, appeared before him. The Ægir will never stop thinking or searching until he finally verifies his conclusion.

month_team_2.teamDes: As long as there are still people holding the coastline, Iberia will not die so easily.

month_team_3.teamDes: Only he burns bright as daylight.

clientChatItemData.chatDesc: 'Whether or not you fear it, it will come for you.'
The priest from the Deep stands upon the broken shore, bringing with it more peace than terror.
Who can say for sure what the color of the sea is? Thorns cannot, but he knows one thing well – he will come to embrace it.
They have no way of knowing if the person in front of them is still an Inquisitor.
People will only comprehend enemies and war through the methods to which they are accustomed.
She leaves her lantern behind and faces the tides alone. Until the end of the conflict, the light will not go out.
The coffins of old friends line up as far as the eye can see. He waits alone for the long rebirth.
As appointed, he comes to the lighthouse at the center of the evernight. Only the watcher gazes upon the storm. Only he glows as the light of day.

rogue_2_variation_1.name: Echoes: Exploration
rogue_2_variation_1.usage: This floor has 2 additional nodes, but twice as much Light will be lost

rogue_2_variation_2.name: Echoes: Predation
rogue_2_variation_2.usage: On this floor, all your units and non-Boss units gain +50 ASPD, and your units receive -70% healing effectiveness

rogue_2_variation_3.name: Echoes: Assimilation
rogue_2_variation_3.usage: On this floor, you will obtain 3 Originium Ingots every time you enter a non-combat node, but will lose all Originium Ingots gained on this floor after exiting

rogue_2_variation_4.name: Echoes: Death and Rebirth
rogue_2_variation_4.usage: Battles on this floor drop +100% Originium Ingots; upon entering a combat node, you will immediately lose 1 Life Point (Cannot drop below 1 from this effect)

rogue_2_variation_5.name: Echoes: Proliferation
rogue_2_variation_5.usage: Battles on this floor have a 30% chance to drop a Recruitment Voucher; all enemy units have +15 RES

rogue_2_variation_6.name: Echoes: One Among Many
rogue_2_variation_6.usage: Battles on this floor grant +50% Command EXP; all enemy units have +50% DEF

rogue_2_variation_7.name: Echoes: Overgrowth
rogue_2_variation_7.usage: After the end of each battle on this floor, gain 1 Max Life Point; however, Life Point and Shield losses are doubled

rogue_2_variation_8.name: Echoes: Adaptation
rogue_2_variation_8.usage: The first Wish Fulfilled node you enter on this floor will grant 1 random collectible, but you will no longer be able to identify node types beyond the nodes directly ahead of you

rogue_2_mutation_1.name: Hemopoietic Inhibition
rogue_2_mutation_1.usage: Operators with this Rejection will continuously lose HP whenever their HP is not full
rogue_2_mutation_1.desc: Accelerated blood cell apoptosis, inhibited bone marrow hematopoiesis

rogue_2_mutation_2.name: Concentration Disorder
rogue_2_mutation_2.usage: Operators with this Rejection will automatically activate their skill
rogue_2_mutation_2.desc: Impairment of sensory functions, loss of coordination, loss of control over stress mechanisms

rogue_2_mutation_3.name: Neurodegeneration
rogue_2_mutation_3.usage: Operators with this Rejection will be Frozen for 15 seconds after deployment
rogue_2_mutation_3.desc: Atrophy of neurons in the brain, delayed reactions, dissociated consciousness

rogue_2_mutation_4.name: Metastatic Aberration
rogue_2_mutation_4.usage: Operators with this Rejection have -50% Max HP, ATK, DEF, Deployment Cost, and Redeployment Time
rogue_2_mutation_4.desc: External cells observed in circulatory system, ectopic electrical signaling, whole-body tissue spasms

rogue_2_virtue_1.name: Ursus's Warcry
rogue_2_virtue_1.usage: For 30 seconds after the start of battle, all enemies have -30% ATK and Movement Speed
rogue_2_virtue_1.desc: 'The peal of winter's thunder is the victory cry of Ursus.'

rogue_2_virtue_2.name: Yan's Vicissitudes
rogue_2_virtue_2.usage: The Operator on the battlefield with the highest HP will restore an additional 2 SP per second
rogue_2_virtue_2.desc: 'Time is like a loom, weaving Yan's majestic mountains and rivers.'

rogue_2_virtue_3.name: Columbia's Inspiration
rogue_2_virtue_3.usage: Gain an additional 70 Command EXP at the end of the next battle (One-time only)
rogue_2_virtue_3.desc: 'In a land shackled by the past, Columbia is already crafting the future.'

rogue_2_virtue_4.name: Sami's Tenacity
rogue_2_virtue_4.usage: The Operator on the battlefield with the lowest HP percentage restores 50 HP per second
rogue_2_virtue_4.desc: 'As long as nature continues to breathe, Sami's bloodline will not run dry.'

rogue_2_virtue_5.name: Victoria's Honor
rogue_2_virtue_5.usage: All friendly melee units have +35% Physical and Arts Dodge
rogue_2_virtue_5.desc: 'History has borne witness to Victoria's ascent, and it shall continue to do so.'

rogue_2_virtue_6.name: Leithanien's Elegance
rogue_2_virtue_6.usage: All friendly ranged units have +300 DEF and +30 RES
rogue_2_virtue_6.desc: 'Without art or emotion in our hearts, what difference is there between us and metal crabs?'

rogue_2_virtue_7.name: Sargon's Generosity
rogue_2_virtue_7.desc: 'The riches of the golden city fell to wind and sand, and thus Sargon came to glitter brightly.'
