battleLoadingTips.tip: Seaborn –– Non-human lifeforms born of the ocean, initiators of the Profound Silence. They have a very short evolutionary cycle to deal with hostile creatures and the environment. To this day, they continue to threaten Ægir and the coasts of Iberia.
'Firstborn' –– The ocean's first Seaborn, with body and power akin to a Feranmut. All the ocean's surviving Seaborn and Sea Terrors are His progeny.

Ægir –– An advanced civilization hidden beneath the waves, boasting scientific and technological development far exceeding that of the countries on land. Affected by the stirring of the Seaborn, the entire country has sunken into silence.
Iberia –– A coastal power that once rose to greatness using the boon of Ægir technology. Nearly destroyed by the Profound Silence, only the Inquisition remains to lead this shattered country.
During your initial recruitment, you can recruit your friends' Operators via Support Recruitment.
Operators recruited via 'Temporary Recruitment' will not consume Hope. Do not miss the opportunity.
'Hope' can be used to recruit or promote Operators.
Combining different collectibles can lead to amazing results.
Train more Operators and explore the synergies between them to gain a greater advantage during combat.
The abilities of the first Operators you recruit are equivalent to Elite 1
You can consume 'Subjective Imagination' to permanently increase your abilities during explorations.
Enlightenments are extremely powerful, and can normally be obtained during [Deep Dive] while your Light level is <Luminous>.
Light has four states: Luminous (100), Flickering (50-99), Dim (1-49), and Extinguished (0).
During [Deep Dive], your Light as well as your Die will protect you from the ocean's negative effects. However, the weaker your Light level, the less protection it will offer.
Failing to obtain perfect clear or finishing combat with your Life Points at less than half of the Max Life Points will cause your Light to be reduced.
After your Light has been <Extinguished>, a [Deep Dive] will leave at least one Operator afflicted with a Rejection.

rogue_2_band_10.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 20 Operators

rogue_2_band_11.name: Mind Over Matter Squad
rogue_2_band_11.usage: Battles have a chance to yield an additional collectible

rogue_2_band_12.name: Mind Over Matter Squad
rogue_2_band_12.usage: Battles have a chance to yield an additional collectible; you may choose an additional reward after completing a commission
rogue_2_band_12.unlockCondDesc: Unlock 'Rationality and Estimation' in Cognitive Shaping

rogue_2_band_13.name: Mind Over Matter Squad
rogue_2_band_13.usage: Battles have a higher chance to yield an additional collectible; you may choose an additional reward after completing a commission

rogue_2_band_15.name: Resourceful Squad
rogue_2_band_15.usage: Gain 1 Die Roll upon entering a new floor

rogue_2_band_16.name: Resourceful Squad
rogue_2_band_16.usage: Gain 1 Die Roll upon entering a new floor; your starting die is upgraded to an 8-sided die

rogue_2_band_17.name: Resourceful Squad
rogue_2_band_17.usage: Gain 2 Die Rolls upon entering a new floor; your starting die is upgraded to an 8-sided die

rogue_2_band_19.name: People-Oriented Squad
rogue_2_band_19.usage: All Operators cost -1 Hope to recruit

rogue_2_band_20.name: People-Oriented Squad
rogue_2_band_20.usage: All Operators cost -1 Hope to recruit; you may choose an additional reward at the 'Safe House' node

rogue_2_band_21.name: People-Oriented Squad
rogue_2_band_21.usage: All Operators cost -1 Hope to recruit and promote; you may choose an additional reward at the 'Safe House' node

rogue_2_active_tool_1.name: Support Replenishment Station
rogue_2_active_tool_1.description: An emergency Portable Supply Station provided to field operators.
rogue_2_active_tool_1.usage: Bring a Portable Supply Station along to each battle

rogue_2_active_tool_2.name: Support Landmine Set
rogue_2_active_tool_2.description: An emergency set of Interference Mines provided to field operators.
rogue_2_active_tool_2.usage: Bring 3 Interference Mines along to each battle

rogue_2_active_tool_3.name: Support Mr. Boom
rogue_2_active_tool_3.description: An emergency Mr. Boom provided to field operators.
rogue_2_active_tool_3.usage: Bring 2 Mr. Booms along to each battle

rogue_2_active_tool_4.name: Support Escape Crane
rogue_2_active_tool_4.description: An emergency Snowsant's Safe Escape Crane provided to field operators.
rogue_2_active_tool_4.usage: Bring 2 Snowsant's Safe Escape Cranes along to each battle

rogue_2_active_tool_5.name: Support Riot Pile
rogue_2_active_tool_5.description: An emergency set of Riot Piles provided to field operators.
rogue_2_active_tool_5.usage: Bring 2 Riot Piles along to each battle

rogue_2_active_tool_6.name: Support First-aid Kit
rogue_2_active_tool_6.description: An emergency First-aid Kit provided to field operators.
rogue_2_active_tool_6.usage: Bring 3 First-aid Kits to each battle

rogue_2_dice_battle1.name: 6-Sided Die
rogue_2_dice_battle1.usage: A six-sided die that can be used in battle

rogue_2_dice_battle2.name: 8-Sided Die
rogue_2_dice_battle2.usage: An eight-sided die that can be used in battle

rogue_2_dice_battle3.name: 12-Sided Die
rogue_2_dice_battle3.usage: A twelve-sided die that can be used in battle

rogue_2_relic_grace_1.name: Featured Canned Meat
rogue_2_relic_grace_1.description: For travelers on a long journey, the convenience of 'Ready to Eat' is often more important than taste.
rogue_2_relic_grace_1.usage: +1 Squad Size Limit, all friendly units recover 3 HP per second

rogue_2_relic_grace_2.name: Seaweed Salad
rogue_2_relic_grace_2.description: Once a national delicacy of great pride to the Iberians, now gradually slipping away from memory as a result of the rampaging Seaborn.
rogue_2_relic_grace_2.usage: +1 Squad Size Limit, all friendly units gain +1 ASPD
rogue_2_relic_grace_2.unlockCondDesc: In a single 'Buy Now, Print Now' event, consecutively insert coins at least 4 times

rogue_2_relic_grace_3.name: Orange Storm
rogue_2_relic_grace_3.description: A Mama John's candy product. The orange flavor, cheap and delicious, is a best-seller among children.
rogue_2_relic_grace_3.usage: +1 Squad Size Limit, all friendly units gain +1% ATK

rogue_2_relic_grace_4.name: Coffee Plains Coffee Candy
rogue_2_relic_grace_4.description: Dossoles' famous coffee-flavored candy product. Has real caffeine added, to keep you wide awake from clock-in to overtime.
rogue_2_relic_grace_4.usage: +2 Squad Size Limit, all friendly units gain +2 ASPD
rogue_2_relic_grace_4.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 70 Operators

rogue_2_relic_grace_5.name: Screaming Cherry
rogue_2_relic_grace_5.description: A Mama John's candy product. Though the niche vinegar-pickled cherry flavor can't compete with the best-sellers in popularity, there have always been a small group of loyal and dedicated consumers. Rumor has it that one of Mama John's directors loves this flavor.
rogue_2_relic_grace_5.usage: +2 Squad Size Limit, all friendly units gain +2% ATK

rogue_2_relic_grace_6.name: Pitt's Assorted Fruits
rogue_2_relic_grace_6.description: Pitt's assorted fruit candies compete with Mama John's line of products in the sweets market with a rich taste and superb cost-effectiveness. Muelsyse's favorite.
rogue_2_relic_grace_6.usage: +3 Squad Size Limit, all friendly units gain +3% ATK, DEF, and HP
rogue_2_relic_grace_6.unlockCondDesc: Reach a Squad Size Limit of 13 at any point

rogue_2_relic_grace_7.name: Topographical Map
rogue_2_relic_grace_7.description: A hand-drawn map that exudes a sense of antiquity. The labels and corresponding terrain have been enlarged, and there seems to be something off about its scale.
rogue_2_relic_grace_7.usage: +1 Deployment Limit, all friendly units gain +4% DEF

rogue_2_relic_grace_8.name: Conch of Divine Whispers
rogue_2_relic_grace_8.description: Sound it, and gods you've never seen or even heard of will answer your call. Actually, it's just a hollow conch shell.
rogue_2_relic_grace_8.usage: +1 Deployment Limit, all friendly units gain +4% HP

rogue_2_relic_grace_9.name: Night-Whispers in the Forest
rogue_2_relic_grace_9.description: A special aromatherapy set prepared for field operators by the Convalescent Garden, consisting of fifteen herbal extracts in 172 different combinations. When the wind wends into wooded vales, all creatures lower their voices, and one can find respite.
rogue_2_relic_grace_9.usage: +2 Deployment Limit, all friendly units gain +6% DEF

rogue_2_relic_grace_10.name: Church Alms Meal Voucher
rogue_2_relic_grace_10.description: In the declining coastal towns of Iberia, certain churches will provide alms in the form of meals, which their believers can redeem using vouchers. As for how these vouchers are distributed, that is a secret.
rogue_2_relic_grace_10.usage: +2 Deployment Limit, all friendly units gain +6% HP

rogue_2_relic_grace_11.name: Extra-Pungent Coffee Beans
rogue_2_relic_grace_11.description: Coffee growers feed their beans to a rare, unusual-smelling breed of fowlbeast before extracting and processing them from its excrement. The unique aroma produced by the beast's gastric acid fermentation triples the price of the coffee beans.
rogue_2_relic_grace_11.usage: +1 Squad Size Limit, +1 Deployment Limit, +1 Objective Shield
rogue_2_relic_grace_11.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 120 Operators

rogue_2_relic_grace_12.name: Blue Silk Scarf
rogue_2_relic_grace_12.description: A lady's elegant scarf. Her appearance is a sign that it is safe here.
rogue_2_relic_grace_12.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, earn a total of 50 Hope

rogue_2_relic_grace_13.name: Red Bow Tie
rogue_2_relic_grace_13.description: The first present Phantom gave Ms. Christine. She is really fond of it.
rogue_2_relic_grace_13.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, earn a total of 150 Hope

rogue_2_relic_grace_14.name: Solo Music Box
rogue_2_relic_grace_14.description: An old music box. The music does not play when the box is opened, nor does the figure inside show any signs it is about to move. There is not a peep, and no one is breaking out in dance. Before she begins her performances with Phantom, the lead actress stares blankly into the music box.
rogue_2_relic_grace_14.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 8 Hope remaining

rogue_2_relic_grace_15.name: Originium Iris
rogue_2_relic_grace_15.description: A most extravagant bouquet of flowers. The troupe leader has handed flowers like these to the leads during countless curtain calls.
rogue_2_relic_grace_15.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 60 Max Hope

rogue_2_relic_grace_16.name: Weird Flute
rogue_2_relic_grace_16.description: A weird-looking flute. Someone plays it day in and day out.

rogue_2_relic_grace_17.name: Glass Bird
rogue_2_relic_grace_17.description: 'In this paradise of mine, the bird will sing forever and ever.'

rogue_2_relic_grace_18.name: Pure Gold Expedition
rogue_2_relic_grace_18.description: The regent departed from the wastelands, and markets rose from beneath her dress like sprouts budding in the spring. The road of prosperity connected high mountains and dense forests, following her until she disappeared beyond the cliffs overlooking the western waves. —Ancient Sargon Fairy Tale
rogue_2_relic_grace_18.usage: +4 Hope, +1 Squad Size Limit, +1 Deployment Limit

rogue_2_relic_grace_19.name: 'Durin Overground Odyssey'
rogue_2_relic_grace_19.description: In this expedition account, we get a glimpse of how those who live underground see those who live on the surface.
rogue_2_relic_grace_19.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, lose a total of 50 Life Point

rogue_2_relic_grace_20.name: 'Gaulish Toponym Origins'
rogue_2_relic_grace_20.description: A book of historical place names that Mint dug out of the Doctor's office. Calais-Blason is mentioned in the book.
rogue_2_relic_grace_20.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, lose a total of 125 Life Point

rogue_2_relic_grace_21.name: Hot Water Kettle
rogue_2_relic_grace_21.description: Some people often use the same kettle in the Rhodes Island Office to cook instant noodles in the middle of the night. That’s not a very healthy lifestyle...

rogue_2_relic_grace_22.name: Special Suppressor
rogue_2_relic_grace_22.description: An enhanced suppressor developed by Rhodes Island that can better keep the infected from losing control of their Originium Arts.
rogue_2_relic_grace_22.usage: +2 Max Life Point, recover 2 Life Point

rogue_2_relic_grace_23.name: Stone Gargoyle
rogue_2_relic_grace_23.description: A palm-sized sculpture. Supposedly they are handmade gifts given out by the Gargoyles as a sign of friendship.

rogue_2_relic_grace_24.name: Vampire's Bed
rogue_2_relic_grace_24.description: A lavish-looking coffin that matches the castle's aesthetics well. However, Warfarin says this is merely a stereotype.

rogue_2_relic_grace_25.name: Proof of Longevity
rogue_2_relic_grace_25.description:
A tree branch that has withered and flourished. 
When it is withered, it grows anew. When it is thriving in its fullest, it fades away yet again.

rogue_2_relic_grace_26.name: Pried Open Toolbox
rogue_2_relic_grace_26.description: The tool box of the troupe's prop master. From nails to dummy props, it has everything.

rogue_2_relic_grace_27.name: Antiquated Sheet Music
rogue_2_relic_grace_27.description: A tattered piece of sheet music. The notes can no longer be clearly read. No one knows for certain what story this piece was meant to tell.

rogue_2_relic_grace_28.name: Letter of Termination Contract
rogue_2_relic_grace_28.description: You can break free from this troupe with just one signature.
rogue_2_relic_grace_28.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 30 Operators

rogue_2_relic_grace_29.name: Universal Key
rogue_2_relic_grace_29.description: An old, silver key. It can open any door. As the keeper, the troupe's butler naturally needs a key that unlocks all the secrets here.

rogue_2_relic_grace_30.name: Banshee's Kiss
rogue_2_relic_grace_30.description: Outsiders make extraordinary displays of bravery that far surpass their normal abilities. However, as one of the few male Banshees out there, this has become a far too common sight to Logos.

rogue_2_relic_grace_31.name: Antique Coins
rogue_2_relic_grace_31.description: An ancient, rusty coin, weathered to the point where one can no longer identify its age. Things like these are all too common throughout Terra's barrens.

rogue_2_relic_grace_32.name: Actor's Jewelry Box
rogue_2_relic_grace_32.description: A box containing all kinds of shattered jewelry. The young lead actress wore this jewelry and stepped onto the stage, in the end falling from its highest point.

rogue_2_relic_grace_33.name: Flawless Jadestone
rogue_2_relic_grace_33.description: Even though it thrice brought the city to ruins, it yet shines radiantly in its flawless form. Even today, the Sargonian emperor in possession of the gem has yet to find another piece of jewelry matching its brilliance, leaving it with naught but gunsmoke for a companion.
rogue_2_relic_grace_33.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 20 Originium Ingots remaining

rogue_2_relic_grace_34.name: Game Room Admin Access Card
rogue_2_relic_grace_34.description: With this, you have become master over Rhodes Island's entertainment privileges. Please exercise caution when processing the various strange applications from the Operators... and remember to lock the door every day.
rogue_2_relic_grace_34.usage: Immediately Promote an Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_35.name: Ms. Christine Petting Ticket
rogue_2_relic_grace_35.usage: Immediately Promote 2 Operators (Does not require Hope)
rogue_2_relic_grace_35.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 15 Operators

rogue_2_relic_grace_36.name: Antique Casting
rogue_2_relic_grace_36.description: 'Heavenly forge, take the bounty of the earth.' ...Even though it can be used for all kinds of work, nobody understands its exact mechanism.
rogue_2_relic_grace_36.usage: Immediately Promote 3 Operators (Does not require Hope)
rogue_2_relic_grace_36.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recruit a total of 35 Operators

rogue_2_relic_grace_37.name: Blunt Claws - Training
rogue_2_relic_grace_37.description: A formidable set of equipment to provide strength, an indomitable heart to press forward bravely.
rogue_2_relic_grace_37.usage: Immediately Promote a Vanguard Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_38.name: Bend Spears - Training
rogue_2_relic_grace_38.description: Some people use swords because they don't know how to use crossbows or Arts. Others use swords because that's all they need.
rogue_2_relic_grace_38.usage: Immediately Promote a Guard Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_39.name: Iron Guard - Training
rogue_2_relic_grace_39.description: Scars symbolize glory, but who will remember the soldiers who were cut a bit too deeply?
rogue_2_relic_grace_39.usage: Immediately Promote a Defender Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_40.name: Fatal Bolts - Training
rogue_2_relic_grace_40.description: 'Either you learn to control your ignition, or you learn to discern your target. Got it?'
rogue_2_relic_grace_40.usage: Immediately Promote a Sniper Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_41.name: Broken Wand - Training
rogue_2_relic_grace_41.description: 'After watching the 'performances' of certain casters, I decided to quietly put away the Leithanian textbook.'
rogue_2_relic_grace_41.usage: Immediately Promote a Caster Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_42.name: Stalwart Aid - Training
rogue_2_relic_grace_42.description: Their tactics are always diverse and colorful.
rogue_2_relic_grace_42.usage: Immediately Promote a Supporter Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_43.name: Healer's Path - Training
rogue_2_relic_grace_43.description: When the day comes that everyone is a doctor capable of curing the disease known as life, we will no longer need doctors.
rogue_2_relic_grace_43.usage: Immediately Promote a Medic Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_44.name: Rusted Blade - Training
rogue_2_relic_grace_44.description: If you haven't properly prepared for a live combat drill with a Specialist Operator, you should be prepared for a thorough beating.
rogue_2_relic_grace_44.usage: Immediately Promote a Specialist Operator (Does not require Hope)

rogue_2_relic_grace_45.name: Regional Action Plan
rogue_2_relic_grace_45.description: Rhodes Island has dedicated offices in every major hub. The Messengers are doing what they can to weave a fragile web across the world.

rogue_2_relic_grace_46.name: Comprehensive Operation File
rogue_2_relic_grace_46.description: A vessel sailing upon the land is like treading upon thin ice. Remember to always expand your worldview.
rogue_2_relic_grace_46.unlockCondDesc: At any time, have five 5-star Operators

rogue_2_relic_grace_47.name: Secret HR Letter
rogue_2_relic_grace_47.description: '■■■ gave it to you? Never mind, then.'
rogue_2_relic_grace_47.unlockCondDesc: At any time, have four 6-star Operators

rogue_2_relic_grace_48.name: Draft of a Speech
rogue_2_relic_grace_48.description: She was a little nervous, a little worried, but still remained resolute. When the microphone turned on, her long ears quivered slightly.
rogue_2_relic_grace_48.usage: All Operators cost -2 Hope to recruit
rogue_2_relic_grace_48.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 15 Operators

rogue_2_relic_grace_49.name: Rusted Iron Hammer
rogue_2_relic_grace_49.description: 'Change is necessary, and we must do all we can to hasten the oncoming storm.'
rogue_2_relic_grace_49.usage: Shop vendors charge -50% Originium Ingots for their goods

rogue_2_relic_grace_50.name: Rhodes Island Tactical Transceiver
rogue_2_relic_grace_50.description: Hang in there, help's on the way.
rogue_2_relic_grace_50.usage: Gain an additional choice when Recruitment Vouchers are dropped after battle

rogue_2_relic_grace_51.name: Four-Leaf Clover Fossil
rogue_2_relic_grace_51.description: A symbol of luck that Magallan found in a place all but devoid of life. The rock has no doubt experienced many violent changes of the lands, but it survived, giving those who come across it a small bit of lingering hope.
rogue_2_relic_grace_51.usage: Gain an additional choice when loot drops from a Wish Fulfilled node or after battle

rogue_2_relic_grace_52.name: 'Silent Squad'
rogue_2_relic_grace_52.description: A set of exploration drones remotely controlled by the Rhodes Island Engineering Department. More efficient and safer than ever, they provide operators on field missions the omnidirectional support and defense they need.
rogue_2_relic_grace_52.usage: All friendly units have +35% ATK, +35% DEF, and +45% HP

rogue_2_relic_grace_53.name: Acahuallan Bowl
rogue_2_relic_grace_53.description: Fruit is one of the locals' staples, often eaten fresh right off the tree.

rogue_2_relic_grace_54.name: Three-Dimensional Art Display
rogue_2_relic_grace_54.description: The impression that Rhine Lab often gives is akin to this work of art: inscrutable, multi-faceted, impossible to sift fact from fiction.
rogue_2_relic_grace_54.usage: Restore 7 Life Point, restore an additional 1 Life Point after each battle
rogue_2_relic_grace_54.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, lose a total of 100 Life Point

rogue_2_relic_grace_57.name: 'Multipurpose' Hair Clip
rogue_2_relic_grace_57.description: Its materials are clearly damage-resistant, but are its other functions as impressive as what the Kazimierzian merchant boasted? Come to think of it, why does a bobby pin need so many extra features anyway?
rogue_2_relic_grace_57.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, enter a total of 40 non-combat nodes

rogue_2_relic_grace_59.name: Three-Key Contract
rogue_2_relic_grace_59.description: According to regulations, lighthouse keepers must always carry three keys: one to unlock the main door, another to establish communication, and one to activate the searchlight. Sign your name, and the contract is set in stone. Carry the keys with you at all times, regardless of life or death.
rogue_2_relic_grace_59.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, enter a total of 100 non-combat nodes

rogue_2_relic_grace_60.name: Portable Scriptures
rogue_2_relic_grace_60.description: The few Iberian faithfuls who can still read often carry around a pocket-sized version of the Scriptures with them, taking it out to glance over a few lines during the brief lulls in their struggles for survival. It offers but a modicum of peace.

rogue_2_relic_grace_61.name: Inquisitor's Scripture Cloth
rogue_2_relic_grace_61.description: As part of the decorations adorning an Inquisitor's clothing, this ribbon is inlaid with the Scriptures. Their hearts are firm and unwavering, and these accessories reinforce that image.
rogue_2_relic_grace_61.usage: Gain +1 Die Roll after each battle
rogue_2_relic_grace_61.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, clear a total of 50 battles

rogue_2_relic_grace_62.name: Deep-Sea Sire Sculpture
rogue_2_relic_grace_62.description: The Church of the Deep cultists believe that gods sleep in the depths of the ocean, and the teeming Sea Terrors seem to confirm their beliefs. Seeing as that is indeed the truth, they no longer have any reason to hesitate.
rogue_2_relic_grace_62.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, clear a total of 100 battles

rogue_2_relic_grace_63.name: Duck Lord's Golden Brick
rogue_2_relic_grace_63.description:
'How can someone completely rid themselves of misfortune?' 
'You have a gold brick in your hand, don't you? Shove it up misfortune's mouth.'

rogue_2_relic_grace_64.name: Defender-2
rogue_2_relic_grace_64.description: A mass-produced defensive-type drone. It doesn't make sense how it only seems to be useful in the hands of the enemy.

rogue_2_relic_grace_65.name: Embedded Armor Plate
rogue_2_relic_grace_65.description: 'You don't understand a thing, test subject. Compared to what those monsters of Ursus suffered, a measly plate of armor embedded into your body isn't even worth mentioning.'
rogue_2_relic_grace_65.unlockCondDesc: In a single battle, lose a total of 8 Life Point (including mission failures)

rogue_2_relic_grace_66.name: Nightsun Flower
rogue_2_relic_grace_66.description: It gives off light at night and forms groups to grow, able to provide a certain amount of lighting - hence the name.

rogue_2_relic_grace_67.name: Flamecaller Originium Slug
rogue_2_relic_grace_67.description: A species of wild Originium slug, with plumes of dim flame periodically bursting from its back. Through modern scientific research, it was determined that the creature's incendiary phenomenon was the result of a chemical reaction, not the resurrection of their kin's souls.

rogue_2_relic_grace_68.name: Pathfinder Fin
rogue_2_relic_grace_68.description: An asexual marine creature endemic to the coasts of Iberia, named because they are often said to guide fincatchers back to shore. These days, they are rarely seen, and are now regarded as a symbol of luck by the new generation of Iberians.

rogue_2_relic_grace_76.name: Dario's Lantern
rogue_2_relic_grace_76.description: A lantern once wielded by Inquisitor Dario. Even after his death, the flames of his conviction still burn brightly upon this land.
rogue_2_relic_grace_76.usage: When obtained, suppresses a designated Operator's Rejection

rogue_2_relic_grace_77.name: 'King's Fellowship'
rogue_2_relic_grace_77.description: The Cultists of the Deep did not achieve success overnight; they lingered at the junction between land and sea for ages, preparing for the calamity that would come to be known as the Profound Silence.
rogue_2_relic_grace_77.usage: +2 Objective Shield, coverts all Life Point into an equivalent amount of Objective Shield (Cannot be reduced below 1 by this effect)
rogue_2_relic_grace_77.unlockCondDesc: Complete the ending of an adventure

rogue_2_relic_grace_79.name: Tulip's Secret Formula
rogue_2_relic_grace_79.description: An emergency topical ointment produced through empirical analysis and numerous clinical trials, capable of effectively inhibiting the adverse side-effects Seaborn cells cause within the human body.
rogue_2_relic_grace_79.usage: When obtained, suppresses a designated Operator's Rejection

rogue_2_relic_grace_80.name: Paraffin and Balsam
rogue_2_relic_grace_80.description: Burn it and your impurities shall be shunned, allowing you to remain a pure human being. Praise the flame.
rogue_2_relic_grace_80.usage: -30 Light, when obtained, suppresses a designated Operator's Rejection

rogue_2_relic_grace_81.name: Nightsun Grass
rogue_2_relic_grace_81.description: Only a faint glimmer of light remains on the leaves of the nightsun flower. Contains certain detoxifying compounds and can be used as medicine.

rogue_2_relic_grace_82.name: Cathedral Puzzle
rogue_2_relic_grace_82.description: Every time a piece of the puzzle falls, the Iberian Cathedral becomes more complete. In these times of decay, there is ample comfort to be found in simply being able to piece together one of history's most glorious wonders.

rogue_2_relic_grace_83.name: Breath of the Tide
rogue_2_relic_grace_83.description: He appeared near you because he smelled the scent of the tides. You mean nothing to him.
rogue_2_relic_grace_83.usage: +1 Deployment Limit; when obtained, [Tide-Hunt Knight] will appear on the battlefield until defeated
rogue_2_relic_grace_83.unlockCondDesc: Complete the ending of an adventure

rogue_2_relic_grace_84.name: Regressed Rocinante
rogue_2_relic_grace_84.description: Only a hero can ride it. When the hero dies, so too does its life end.
rogue_2_relic_grace_84.usage: [Tide-Hunt Knight] will no longer appear on the battlefield
rogue_2_relic_grace_84.unlockCondDesc: Complete the ending of an adventure

rogue_2_relic_grace_85.name: 'Absurd Fate'
rogue_2_relic_grace_85.description: His name is widely known in Kazimierz, and his descendants set up companies to benefit from his renown. All the things he defended with his life have become nothing more than gold coins in a wallet.
rogue_2_relic_grace_85.unlockCondDesc: Complete the ending of an adventure

rogue_2_relic_grace_86.name: The Knight's Corpus
rogue_2_relic_grace_86.description: Resisting does not come without a price. The knight's body had long since become riddled with wounds, but he paid no heed. He will fight until the bitter end, even should his body be smashed to pieces.
rogue_2_relic_grace_86.unlockCondDesc: Complete the ending of an adventure

rogue_2_relic_grace_87.name: 'Last Refrain'
rogue_2_relic_grace_87.description:
Cry, cry, for where are the Abyssal Hunters now? 
Alas, alas, there is nothing in the ocean but the sound of the tide.

rogue_2_relic_curse_1.name: Portrait of Breogan
rogue_2_relic_curse_1.description: The subject of the portrait is an Ægir who used to be well-known in Iberia. His inventions and feats once made the country shine, but when the tide drowned out the golden light, his fate was sealed.
rogue_2_relic_curse_1.usage: All Operators lose 15 SP when deployed

rogue_2_relic_curse_2.name: Leviathan's Anabolism
rogue_2_relic_curse_2.description: Slowly did He fall into the deepest depths of the ocean. His blood, flesh, skin, and bones separated and dissolved—they were swept up by the sea's currents, absorbed by all life, and became sustenance for the propagation of the entire ocean.

rogue_2_relic_curse_3.name: Failed Specimen
rogue_2_relic_curse_3.description: An incomplete shelled specimen. Debris falls from small crevices, sticks together, accumulates, and merges with the dead plants inside, until the original husk is completely swallowed up.
rogue_2_relic_curse_3.usage: When obtained, immediately afflicts a random Operator with a Rejection

rogue_2_relic_curse_5.name: 'Emergency Light'
rogue_2_relic_curse_5.description: Ægir warriors used to lock some kind of small luminescent Sea Terror inside a transparent contraption to serve as lighting during emergency situations. The restless Sea Terror would smash into its confines, releasing even more light in a frenzy until it died, staining its prison with an indescribable black glue.
rogue_2_relic_curse_5.usage: Lose an additional 2 Light after each battle

rogue_2_relic_curse_6.name: 'Luminous Corpse'
rogue_2_relic_curse_6.description: To provide light to we many during long migrations, the weakest organs among the collective would dissolve on their own and start glowing, leaving nothing behind but a transparent membrane.
rogue_2_relic_curse_6.usage: Lose an additional 3 Light after each battle

rogue_2_relic_curse_7.name: Bishop's Research
rogue_2_relic_curse_7.description: Almost all of the bishop's lifelong research can be found among these documents and notes, many of which involve experiments that transcended ethics and morality. In his eyes, making contact with the Seaborn was just a means to an end for his ultimate vision: allowing human beings to evolve into a more powerful existence through fusion with the Seaborn.
rogue_2_relic_curse_7.usage: Lose an additional 5 Light after each battle

rogue_2_relic_curse_8.name: Caerula Animus
rogue_2_relic_curse_8.description: The surviving core organ of the 'Firstborn' that devoured Its birthplace and soon died afterwards. Only the Seaborn are able to assimilate it, but only humans are able to understand the grief contained within. Alas, even for those whose evolution never ends, their - Their - suffering will always persist.
rogue_2_relic_curse_8.usage: -50 Light; when obtained, immediately afflicts a random Operator with a Rejection, and leads the exploration toward a different ending

rogue_2_relic_fight_1.name: Fissured Restraints
rogue_2_relic_fight_1.description: It seems this sturdy band was once used to restrain something terrifying... Help...

rogue_2_relic_fight_2.name: Abyssal Wyrdmask
rogue_2_relic_fight_2.description: An eldritch mask not belonging to any culture you’re familiar with, capable of making people lose their will to fight... and unconsciously fall into a state of deep contemplation.
rogue_2_relic_fight_2.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Leader Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_3.name: Godmother's Token
rogue_2_relic_fight_3.description: A laurel of bones, the token of a Sicilian noblewoman. Its orderly appearance symbolizes the desire to stabilize turmoil. Genuine or counterfeit, it still demands you to kneel.

rogue_2_relic_fight_4.name: Worn-out Group Photo
rogue_2_relic_fight_4.description: Do you know someone in the photo?

rogue_2_relic_fight_5.name: Sea Terror Jerky
rogue_2_relic_fight_5.description: Once their desire to survive overwhelms their terror, the famished Iberians will devour this 'food,' subsequently turning into Sea Terrors on some ordinary day.
rogue_2_relic_fight_5.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Gathering Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_7.name: Gold-Plated Die
rogue_2_relic_fight_7.description: The gold-plated die has one side representing life. As for the other nineteen sides...
rogue_2_relic_fight_7.unlockCondDesc: Select 'First-Class Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_8.name: 'The Whisperer in Darknight'
rogue_2_relic_fight_8.description: A black vinyl. DO. NOT. TOUCH. IT.

rogue_2_relic_fight_9.name: 'Profound Silence'
rogue_2_relic_fight_9.description: A painting that depicts the greatest disaster in Iberian history. Its brushstrokes, colors, and images are all meaningless. 'The Ægir know. The Ægir know. The Ægir know.'

rogue_2_relic_fight_10.name: Oriron Round Shield
rogue_2_relic_fight_10.description: Before the use of Oriron became widespread in today's industrial sector, the material was frequently used to forge military weapons like this one.

rogue_2_relic_fight_11.name: Military Mirror Armor
rogue_2_relic_fight_11.description: This mirror armor used to be able to withstand most attacks on the chest, but with the fall of Gaul, such archaic forms of armor have become museum pieces.
rogue_2_relic_fight_11.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Spearhead Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_12.name: Old Steam Armor
rogue_2_relic_fight_12.description: Even this old, outdated steam armor seems to carry with it the resplendence of the era when the Victorian monarchs cast their glory across half the world.

rogue_2_relic_fight_13.name: Emperor's Favor
rogue_2_relic_fight_13.description: A very sharp letter opener. It was one of the favorite possessions of the last Ursus emperor, and as such it was very rarely used to actually open letters.
rogue_2_relic_fight_13.usage: All friendly melee units have +15% ATK

rogue_2_relic_fight_14.name: Royal Rapier
rogue_2_relic_fight_14.description: A highly decorative rapier for nobles. Used by Gaulish nobles first and foremost, though perhaps a little fragile for a military weapon.
rogue_2_relic_fight_14.usage: All friendly melee units have +25% ATK
rogue_2_relic_fight_14.unlockCondDesc: Clear the 3rd Floor, 'Raging Billows,' when you have exactly 0 Originium Ingots

rogue_2_relic_fight_15.name: Vieux Vanguard's Blade
rogue_2_relic_fight_15.description: Prior to its downfall, Gaul first witnessed the sacrifices of its Vieux Vanguards.
rogue_2_relic_fight_15.usage: All friendly melee units have +35% ATK

rogue_2_relic_fight_16.name: Necklace of the Presence
rogue_2_relic_fight_16.description: Faith hangs ten centimeters above your heart, spoken words flow into your blood, and bullets slide into your magazine.
rogue_2_relic_fight_16.usage: All friendly ranged units have +15% ATK

rogue_2_relic_fight_17.name: Silver Forks
rogue_2_relic_fight_17.description: One for dealing with actors who botch their performances, one for dealing with incompetent playwrights, and one for anyone who needs it.
rogue_2_relic_fight_17.usage: All friendly ranged units have +25% ATK
rogue_2_relic_fight_17.unlockCondDesc: Clear the battle, 'Reality,' without losing any Life Point

rogue_2_relic_fight_18.name: Damaged Revolver Cylinder
rogue_2_relic_fight_18.description: She never capitulated, even after enduring countless trials and tribulations. Her muzzle belched tongues of flame that burned like an angry sun, and the glow above her head was brighter than the daylight itself. Buried here is Outcast, our friend.
rogue_2_relic_fight_18.usage: All friendly ranged units have +35% ATK

rogue_2_relic_fight_19.name: Noxious Hemostatic Agent
rogue_2_relic_fight_19.description: 'After fermentation, the body fluids of this Originium slug can be used to stop bleeding.' —'Rhodes Island Wilderness Survival Guide'

rogue_2_relic_fight_20.name: First Aid Kit
rogue_2_relic_fight_20.description: '...Use antibiotics and ethanol additives under professional supervision...' —Rim Billiton Production Safety Manual
rogue_2_relic_fight_20.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Assault Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_21.name: Unknown Instrument
rogue_2_relic_fight_21.description: Don't ask. It's for your own good.

rogue_2_relic_fight_22.name: Rusted Razor
rogue_2_relic_fight_22.description: If you cut yourself with this, you know what will happen.

rogue_2_relic_fight_23.name: Carriage Driver's Whip
rogue_2_relic_fight_23.description: As the troupe's carriage driver, he has no name and no past. His life is meaningful only when he whips his burdenbeasts.
rogue_2_relic_fight_23.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Fortification Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_24.name: 'Avenger'
rogue_2_relic_fight_24.description: A gift from Theresis and set up by Theresa, this is the very first weapon that Ascalon received after her inaugural mission as part of the Military Council.

rogue_2_relic_fight_25.name: Standard Anti-Riot Instrument
rogue_2_relic_fight_25.description: Standard equipment of the Ursus Guard. Comes with an intermittent blinding Originium Arts effect. Unfortunately, not many Guards out there remember this when push comes to shove.

rogue_2_relic_fight_26.name: Emperor's Collection
rogue_2_relic_fight_26.description: The Sami revere their wild lands more than anything, and this fragment of the vast wilderness sleeps in the personal collection of the Emperor of Ursus.
rogue_2_relic_fight_26.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Research Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_27.name: 'Brilliant Lament'
rogue_2_relic_fight_27.description: Their blood yet flows. He should not have left this place.

rogue_2_relic_fight_28.name: Live Rose
rogue_2_relic_fight_28.description: Is it you who nourish her, or is it her who protects you?
rogue_2_relic_fight_28.usage: All friendly units receive +20% healing effectiveness

rogue_2_relic_fight_29.name: White Flower Crown
rogue_2_relic_fight_29.description: A floral veil used in Vampire rituals. Its once vibrant redness has been sucked empty, leaving nothing only a pale white color.
rogue_2_relic_fight_29.usage: All friendly units receive +30% healing effectiveness
rogue_2_relic_fight_29.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recover at least 500000 HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_30.name: Surging Feast
rogue_2_relic_fight_30.description: We've known how to indulge since birth. Do not resist your desires. Submit to them instead.
rogue_2_relic_fight_30.usage: All friendly units receive +30% healing effectiveness and take -30% Elemental Damage
rogue_2_relic_fight_30.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, lose a total of 100 Life Point

rogue_2_relic_fight_31.name: Actor's Perfume
rogue_2_relic_fight_31.description: Troupe actors put this on before going onstage. Stable yet aromatic fragrances like this can help them ease pressure. That's how it seems on the surface, at least.
rogue_2_relic_fight_31.usage: All friendly units recover 1% of their Max HP per second
rogue_2_relic_fight_31.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, recover at least 250000 HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_32.name: Designer's Ruler
rogue_2_relic_fight_32.description: Carefully measured with data and experience, those who wear this armor are known to be several magnitudes luckier.
rogue_2_relic_fight_32.usage: All friendly units have +15% Physical Dodge

rogue_2_relic_fight_33.name: 'Arts Killer'
rogue_2_relic_fight_33.description: Considering how Originium Arts and music go hand in hand in Leithanien, it's quite amazing someone came up with the bright idea of combating Arts with noise like this.
rogue_2_relic_fight_33.usage: All friendly units have +15% Arts Dodge

rogue_2_relic_fight_34.name: Dancer's Bracelets
rogue_2_relic_fight_34.description: The audience breaks into applause as the well-trained dancers waltz around the traps on stage. None of them are aware of the brushes with death the performers have just been through.
rogue_2_relic_fight_34.usage: All friendly units have +10% Physical and Arts Dodge

rogue_2_relic_fight_35.name: Doll House
rogue_2_relic_fight_35.description: All kids need at least one set.

rogue_2_relic_fight_36.name: Miniature Stage Model
rogue_2_relic_fight_36.description: The red paint has not dried yet. Careful. Don't get that paint on your hand.

rogue_2_relic_fight_37.name: Dreambind Castle Model
rogue_2_relic_fight_37.description: You've seen this place, and you once wandered the castle, yet you now hold it in your hand. Is this real, or is it all a dream?

rogue_2_relic_fight_38.name: Vortex Confluence
rogue_2_relic_fight_38.description: Rule the waves, rule the currents. Once, Ægir and the ocean were synonymous.
rogue_2_relic_fight_38.usage: Specialist Operators have +30% ATK, and Caster Operators have +3% ATK

rogue_2_relic_fight_39.name: Ocean Voyage
rogue_2_relic_fight_39.description: Twice they escaped to land, but in this they nevertheless still take pride: Ægir once measured the ocean.
rogue_2_relic_fight_39.usage: Caster Operators have +30% ATK, and Specialist Operators have +3% ATK

rogue_2_relic_fight_40.name: 'Bedrock'
rogue_2_relic_fight_40.description: A weapon said to have been made specifically for an Abyssal Hunter. His master once fought alongside Skadi, smashing the tentacles of a benthic behemoth. But when he cast aside his weapon to block a bony projectile for Skadi, he vanished into the midst of the Sea Terrors' swarm.
rogue_2_relic_fight_40.usage: All Operators have +5 DP Cost, but gain +15% ATK, DEF, and HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_41.name: 'Wavebreaker'
rogue_2_relic_fight_41.description: A weapon said to have been made specifically for an Abyssal Hunter. Her master once was one of Gladiia's team members, responsible for culling countless Sea Terrors. But in order to allow the other teams to approach the benthic behemoth, she voluntarily stayed behind after being seriously wounded, and nobody ever saw her again.
rogue_2_relic_fight_41.usage: All Operators have -25% HP, but have -50% Redeployment Time

rogue_2_relic_fight_42.name: 'Pulse of the Ocean'
rogue_2_relic_fight_42.description: An exquisite water flow meter, capable of monitoring the flow of ocean currents in real time. A common sight among the Ægir people's underwater transportation tools.
rogue_2_relic_fight_42.usage: All friendly units have +10 ASPD, all enemy units have -10 ASPD

rogue_2_relic_fight_43.name: Jet-Black Dance Shoes
rogue_2_relic_fight_43.description: The Columbian dancer's steps are firm and strong, her taps reverberating loudly in the air as she strikes the ground.
rogue_2_relic_fight_43.usage: Can deploy Melee Operators on High Ground tiles
rogue_2_relic_fight_43.unlockCondDesc: Clear the 3rd Floor, 'Raging Billows' 3 times, when you have recruited not less than 6 Ranged Operators or 6 Melee Operators

rogue_2_relic_fight_44.name: Pure White Dance Shoes
rogue_2_relic_fight_44.description: The Ursus dancer's steps are swift and elegant, her body moving as she wills.
rogue_2_relic_fight_44.usage: Can deploy Ranged Operators on Low Ground tiles
rogue_2_relic_fight_44.unlockCondDesc: Clear the 3rd Floor, 'Raging Billows' 3 times, when you have recruited not less than 6 Ranged Operators or 6 Melee Operators

rogue_2_relic_fight_45.name: Viviparous Lily
rogue_2_relic_fight_45.description: An organism that defies common sense. A plant-like ability to reproduce, an animal-like desire to.
rogue_2_relic_fight_45.usage: When a battle begins, reduces the DP Cost of all Operators by 3, then scrambles their DP Cost
rogue_2_relic_fight_45.unlockCondDesc: Complete the ending of an adventure

rogue_2_relic_fight_46.name: Chitinous Ripper
rogue_2_relic_fight_46.description: A more efficient way of growing an exoskeleton. It can tear prey apart, resist impact, and also be turned into a delicacy for its kin.
rogue_2_relic_fight_46.usage: When a battle begins, a random Operator will have +100% ATK and +100% HP for that battle
rogue_2_relic_fight_46.unlockCondDesc: Complete the ending of an adventure

rogue_2_relic_fight_47.name: Blunt Claws - Advancement
rogue_2_relic_fight_47.description: Plant a great stone within the waters. Split the waves and part the fog.
rogue_2_relic_fight_47.usage: Vanguard Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_48.name: Blunt Claws - Burst
rogue_2_relic_fight_48.description: He's already done all the reserve squad's work for them. What else do you expect?
rogue_2_relic_fight_48.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Tidelinked Bishop' once

rogue_2_relic_fight_49.name: Blunt Claws - Proficiency
rogue_2_relic_fight_49.description: As an operator who often enters the battlefield before anyone else, you cannot fathom what they have been through.
rogue_2_relic_fight_49.usage: The SP Cost of Vanguard Operators' skills is decreased by -35%
rogue_2_relic_fight_49.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Tidelinked Bishop' 3 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_50.name: Blunt Claws - Mastery
rogue_2_relic_fight_50.description: 'When the darkly-clad enemies rushed towards me, there were only four words on my mind — they are done for.'
rogue_2_relic_fight_50.usage: Vanguard Operators have +50% ATK and DEF
rogue_2_relic_fight_50.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Tidelinked Bishop' 6 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_51.name: Bend Spears - Advancement
rogue_2_relic_fight_51.description: The warrior walks onto the battlefield. The warrior unsheathes his blade. The warrior faces his foe.
rogue_2_relic_fight_51.usage: Guard Operators have -3 DP Cost and +40% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_52.name: Bend Spears - Acuity
rogue_2_relic_fight_52.description: 'This is the 7th blade you’ve broken this month.' 'But I cut down eight enemies this month.'

rogue_2_relic_fight_53.name: Bend Spears - Bloodbath
rogue_2_relic_fight_53.description: Soldiers who get bolder as time passes are rare. Most need some form of psychological counseling to alleviate the trauma of war.
rogue_2_relic_fight_53.usage: Guard Operators restore 2 SP after each attack
rogue_2_relic_fight_53.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Pathshaper' once

rogue_2_relic_fight_54.name: Bend Spears - Army of One
rogue_2_relic_fight_54.description: One does not need to don heavy armor or hold up a shield to resist enemy attacks. Oftentimes, the best defense is to quickly eliminate those that would harm you.
rogue_2_relic_fight_54.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Pathshaper' 3 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_55.name: Bend Spears - Deathmatch
rogue_2_relic_fight_55.description: I wouldn't really recommend learning those skills from Blaze.
rogue_2_relic_fight_55.usage: Guard Operators have -40% DEF, but gain +40% ATK and +30 ASPD
rogue_2_relic_fight_55.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Pathshaper' 6 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_56.name: Iron Guard - Advancement
rogue_2_relic_fight_56.description: The shieldbearers formed a mountain range and became the earth. What they fight against are not enemies of flesh and blood. They fight against fate and injustice.
rogue_2_relic_fight_56.usage: Defender Operators have -3 DP Cost and +40% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_57.name: Iron Guard - Invasion
rogue_2_relic_fight_57.description: Defensive actions for the sake of teammates or strategic purposes often make people forget about their original aggressiveness.
rogue_2_relic_fight_57.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Saint Carmen' once

rogue_2_relic_fight_58.name: Iron Guard - Advance
rogue_2_relic_fight_58.description: In exchange for an opportunity to attack, the shattered ranks made one more advance.
rogue_2_relic_fight_58.usage: Defender Operators have -1 Block (will not be reduced below 1 on deployment), but gain +40% ATK and +40 ASPD
rogue_2_relic_fight_58.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Saint Carmen' 3 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_59.name: Iron Guard - Impenetrable
rogue_2_relic_fight_59.description: Every blow they endure will turn into anger and be returned severalfold.
rogue_2_relic_fight_59.usage: Defender Operators restore 2 SP after being attacked
rogue_2_relic_fight_59.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Saint Carmen' 6 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_60.name: Fatal Bolts - Advancement
rogue_2_relic_fight_60.description: Load, aim, and fire. Destruction arrives as scheduled.
rogue_2_relic_fight_60.usage: Sniper Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_61.name: Fatal Bolts - Precision
rogue_2_relic_fight_61.description: In an era when Originium Arts were not as robust as they are now, Yan had a saying, 'a pierced willow leaf from a hundred paces,' to praise others for their mastery of archery.
rogue_2_relic_fight_61.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Homecoming' event 2 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_62.name: Fatal Bolts - Crossfire
rogue_2_relic_fight_62.description: The dense crossfire also exposes snipers to great danger. The next battle boils down to a game of vision.
rogue_2_relic_fight_62.usage: Sniper Operators have -40% HP, but gain +40% ATK
rogue_2_relic_fight_62.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Homecoming' event 4 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_63.name: Fatal Bolts - Divine Speed
rogue_2_relic_fight_63.description: It is said that the legendary archers of ancient Victoria can almost shoot a continuous stream of arrows.
rogue_2_relic_fight_63.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Homecoming' event 6 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_64.name: Broken Wand - Advancement
rogue_2_relic_fight_64.description: Let Arts dance around your fingertips. Call the wind and rain, unravel reality, and achieve your grand goals.
rogue_2_relic_fight_64.usage: Caster Operators have -3 DP Cost and +60% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_65.name: Broken Wand - Arts Weaving
rogue_2_relic_fight_65.description: When Leithanians gazes up at the great spires, they often see some strange or even celestial phenomena.
rogue_2_relic_fight_65.usage: Caster Operators have +25% ATK and +25 ASPD
rogue_2_relic_fight_65.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Like Flames to Wood' event 2 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_66.name: Broken Wand - Concentration
rogue_2_relic_fight_66.description: 'When a caster intends to go all out, they will display a completely different temperament — even if we're talking about something like Skyfire's grumpiness.'
rogue_2_relic_fight_66.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Caster Operators by +0.4/s
rogue_2_relic_fight_66.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Like Flames to Wood' event 4 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_67.name: Broken Wand - Malediction
rogue_2_relic_fight_67.description: It is virtually impossible to identify when the Sarkaz first encountered Originium, and the origins of these ancient Arts have long been separated from actual reality and common sense.
rogue_2_relic_fight_67.usage: Caster Operators have -40% HP, but deal +70% Arts damage
rogue_2_relic_fight_67.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Like Flames to Wood' event 6 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_68.name: Stalwart Aid - Advancement
rogue_2_relic_fight_68.description: Whenever you're 'almost done' with a task, what you need at that moment is someone to help you with the 'almost' part.
rogue_2_relic_fight_68.usage: Supporter Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_69.name: Stalwart Aid - Diligence
rogue_2_relic_fight_69.description: Operators tend to give it their all, even to tasks that might seem trivial. The reality is, those tasks are not trivial at all.
rogue_2_relic_fight_69.usage: The SP Cost of Supporter Operators’ skills is decreased by -40%
rogue_2_relic_fight_69.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Lighthouse Keeper' event 2 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_70.name: Stalwart Aid - Assistance
rogue_2_relic_fight_70.description: Bringing meals, showing the right route to take, or even having a heart-to-heart. The key difference between victory and defeat often lies in these little things.
rogue_2_relic_fight_70.usage: Friendly units within the attack range of Supporter Operators gain +20% ATK
rogue_2_relic_fight_70.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Lighthouse Keeper' event 4 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_71.name: Stalwart Aid - Counter-Arts
rogue_2_relic_fight_71.description: There are many ways to weaken an enemy's defensive capabilities: positional devices, armor-stripping Arts, marking weak points, and... giving them a stomachache.
rogue_2_relic_fight_71.usage: Enemies within the attack range of Supporter Operators have -20% DEF and -20% RES
rogue_2_relic_fight_71.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Lighthouse Keeper' event 6 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_72.name: Healer's Path - Advancement
rogue_2_relic_fight_72.description: The desire to save lives is a virtue that mankind must applaud, for that is the support that keeps us alive.
rogue_2_relic_fight_72.usage: Medic Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_73.name: Healer's Path - Self-Treating
rogue_2_relic_fight_73.description: Who says healers can't heal themselves? They simply pop some pills before continuing to help others.
rogue_2_relic_fight_73.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Medic Operators by +0.3/s
rogue_2_relic_fight_73.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp' event 2 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_74.name: Healer's Path - Keen Hands
rogue_2_relic_fight_74.description: Compared to the feat of snatching a life from the grip of death, what is three days of coma afterwards?
rogue_2_relic_fight_74.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp' event 4 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_75.name: Healer's Path - Restore Sanity
rogue_2_relic_fight_75.description: Making one's body as solid as a nomadic city is a bit of a romanticized description, but our medics are ready to put that idea into practice.
rogue_2_relic_fight_75.usage: Friendly units within the attack range of Medic Operators gain Status Resistance
rogue_2_relic_fight_75.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Camp' event 6 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_76.name: Rusted Blade - Advancement
rogue_2_relic_fight_76.description: There may be many means, but only one end.
rogue_2_relic_fight_76.usage: Specialist Operators have -2 DP Cost and +60% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_77.name: Rusted Blade - Execution
rogue_2_relic_fight_77.description: An endless amount of rust to scrape off, and endless amount of work.
rogue_2_relic_fight_77.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Advance Squad' event 2 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_78.name: Rusted Blade - Isolation
rogue_2_relic_fight_78.description: The director of S.W.E.E.P. does not have any mission participation records. *None*.
rogue_2_relic_fight_78.usage: Specialist Operators have +40% ATK and DEF

rogue_2_relic_fight_79.name: Rusted Blade - No Man's Land
rogue_2_relic_fight_79.description: Sound is eliminated the moment the shadows pass by, and whoever hears them is next.
rogue_2_relic_fight_79.usage: The Redeployment Time of Specialist Operators is reduced by -35%
rogue_2_relic_fight_79.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Advance Squad' event 4 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_80.name: Rusted Blade - Overwhelm
rogue_2_relic_fight_80.description: Terrain is one aspect of battle... That’s all I can say.
rogue_2_relic_fight_80.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, enter the 'Advance Squad' event 6 times

rogue_2_relic_fight_81.name: Hand of Spikes
rogue_2_relic_fight_81.description: Let the enemy make his move. He will be his own downfall.
rogue_2_relic_fight_81.usage: Protector, Arts Protector, and Duelist Operators deal 100% DEF as Arts damage per second to all enemies they are blocking

rogue_2_relic_fight_82.name: Hand of Choker
rogue_2_relic_fight_82.description: With your last strength, break open a last bit of hope for yourself.
rogue_2_relic_fight_82.usage: Heavyshooter, Deadeye, and Besieger Operators' attacks will instantly defeat enemies below 20% HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_83.name: Hand of Buckler
rogue_2_relic_fight_83.description: Drop by drop, bit by bit. It is unstoppable.
rogue_2_relic_fight_83.usage: Decel Binder, Hexer, and Abjurer Operators' attacks deal additional Arts damage equal to 3% of the target's current HP

rogue_2_relic_fight_84.name: Hand of Diffusion
rogue_2_relic_fight_84.usage: Fortress, Chain Caster, and Blast Caster Operators recover 2 SP each time they deal damage to an enemy unit

rogue_2_relic_fight_85.name: Hand of Superspeed
rogue_2_relic_fight_85.description: You swing your hand, leaving not even an afterimage.
rogue_2_relic_fight_85.usage: Executor, Ambusher, and Dollkeeper Operators gain +120 ASPD when there are no friendly units in the four adjacent tiles

rogue_2_relic_fight_86.name: Hand of Snatcher
rogue_2_relic_fight_86.description: Whatever it is you do not have, snatch it away from your enemy. There is no need to hesitate.
rogue_2_relic_fight_86.usage: Charger, Pioneer, and Tactician Operators have -12 DP Cost and generate an additional 6 SP after defeating an enemy

rogue_2_relic_fight_87.name: Ancient Gaulish Silver Coin
rogue_2_relic_fight_87.description: A coin once circulated in the now fallen nation 'Gaul.' It is in very good shape, making it highly valuable as a collector's item.

rogue_2_relic_fight_88.name: Bank of Gaul Check
rogue_2_relic_fight_88.description: An extravagant checkbook plated in gold and silver. Can no longer be cashed.

rogue_2_relic_fight_89.name: 'Second Economic Reform Act'
rogue_2_relic_fight_89.description: With this bill as the starting point, Gaul formally began its path to become a hegemonic empire.

rogue_2_relic_fight_90.name: Vanilla Soda
rogue_2_relic_fight_90.description: Bolívar's cheap specialty drink dates back hundreds of years. It is mixed with a variety of spices, and is known for not being very good.
rogue_2_relic_fight_90.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.2/s

rogue_2_relic_fight_91.name: Fowlbeast Liver Pate
rogue_2_relic_fight_91.description: A small jar of fowlbeast liver pâté. Bright and vividly colorful, it is eaten only by nobles.
rogue_2_relic_fight_91.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.35/s
rogue_2_relic_fight_91.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Destruction Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_92.name: Dreaming Essence
rogue_2_relic_fight_92.description: Supposedly the Banshees make their aromatics only for their beloved. A single drop is enough to enchant just about anyone, bringing out any artist's inspiration and creativity.
rogue_2_relic_fight_92.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Auto Recovery skills by +0.5/s

rogue_2_relic_fight_93.name: Captain Morgan's Wine
rogue_2_relic_fight_93.description: A wine produced in the Iberian region. Despite having gained popularity in the heart of Victoria’s bustling cities, it is now discontinued.
rogue_2_relic_fight_93.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 3s

rogue_2_relic_fight_94.name: Water of Life
rogue_2_relic_fight_94.description: The strongest Ursus liquors go straight to one’s head, but it's said that the healthy Ursus adult can down several bottles.
rogue_2_relic_fight_94.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 2.5s
rogue_2_relic_fight_94.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Tactical Ranged Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_95.name: Royal Liqueur
rogue_2_relic_fight_95.description: The fine wines of the fallen nation of Gaul have now become prized treasures for collectors. The place of production has moved to Leithanien, but the technique has been lost.
rogue_2_relic_fight_95.usage: Increases the SP regen rate of Offensive and Defensive Recovery skills by 1 SP per 1.5s

rogue_2_relic_fight_96.name: 'Unleashings'
rogue_2_relic_fight_96.description: After multiple tries, Touch naturally opens up to you, albeit temporarily.
rogue_2_relic_fight_96.usage: All Operators recover 1 SP every time they take damage or Elemental Damage
rogue_2_relic_fight_96.unlockCondDesc: Clear the battle, 'Separation and Unity,' without losing any Life Point

rogue_2_relic_fight_97.name: String Puppet
rogue_2_relic_fight_97.description: The more you struggle and try to break free, the tighter the strings get. Do you really think you are still thinking rationally?
rogue_2_relic_fight_97.usage: Enemies receive 700 Arts Damage per second when stunned, frozen, or bound

rogue_2_relic_fight_98.name: 'Children's Puppet'
rogue_2_relic_fight_98.description: A simple puppet made by Iberian children using trinkets found on the seacoast. Supposedly just holding it tight will give you much richer dreams.
rogue_2_relic_fight_98.usage: Enemies receive 1000 Arts Damage per second when stunned, frozen, or bound

rogue_2_relic_fight_99.name: Victory Horn
rogue_2_relic_fight_99.description: Blow the horn, cry out, and scatter our foes with its roar!
rogue_2_relic_fight_99.usage: Increases the duration of single-instance status effects such as stun, cold, or freeze by 100%

rogue_2_relic_fight_100.name: Flash Camera
rogue_2_relic_fight_100.description: Every photo shot by this camera is washed out in white, with only the victim's twisted expression faintly visible.
rogue_2_relic_fight_100.usage: Increases the duration of single-instance status effects such as stun, cold, or freeze by 110%
rogue_2_relic_fight_100.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 3 Supporter Operators

rogue_2_relic_fight_101.name: Therapy Tape
rogue_2_relic_fight_101.description: He tried to stop you from listening. He said it was dangerous. He said you should not stay. Do you understand now? You are listening to his song.
rogue_2_relic_fight_101.usage: Increases the duration of single-instance status effects such as stun, cold, or freeze by 150%

rogue_2_relic_fight_102.name: Royal Brooch
rogue_2_relic_fight_102.description: An ornament worn by Gaulish royalty, made from gold and inlaid with expensive Originium crystals. They are more than decoration: many of these brooches hide Originium circuits loaded with defensive Arts.
rogue_2_relic_fight_102.usage: All friendly units have +15 RES, and dodge one instance of damage after deployment

rogue_2_relic_fight_103.name: Old Fan
rogue_2_relic_fight_103.description: When it rains for several days on end, the old Yanese Tianshi complains to his friends about the pain in his knees, before casually waving his fan and driving away the rainclouds. It is about time he taught this trick to his young apprentice, currently working at the Central Judicial Office.
rogue_2_relic_fight_103.usage: All Operators gain +10% ATK for every different type of Operator class in the squad
rogue_2_relic_fight_103.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 15 Operators

rogue_2_relic_fight_104.name: Nachzehrer's Cane
rogue_2_relic_fight_104.description: Life is the Nachzehrer's sustenance and currency.
rogue_2_relic_fight_104.usage: When a friendly unit is overhealed, nearby enemies take Arts damage equal to the overheal amount
rogue_2_relic_fight_104.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 3 Medic Operators

rogue_2_relic_fight_105.name: Angelina's Inspiration
rogue_2_relic_fight_105.description: The girl has no qualms about sharing her Originium Arts. She believes that you will use them for the right reasons.
rogue_2_relic_fight_105.usage: All enemies have -15% Movement Speed, and -1 Weight Level

rogue_2_relic_fight_106.name: Scout's Scope
rogue_2_relic_fight_106.description: Lock on, aim, fire, and destroy the enemy's will to resist, all in the name of a better future that Scout will never see. Maybe you can do it for him.
rogue_2_relic_fight_106.usage: Enemies take increased damage from friendly units as distance increases (max 50%)

rogue_2_relic_fight_107.name: Black Tulip
rogue_2_relic_fight_107.description: The Silence crushed the Iberians, so she wishes to speak up. If her words are not sharp enough, then her sword will speak for her.
rogue_2_relic_fight_107.usage: Friendly Operators gradually gain ATK when not using a skill, up to a maximum of +60% after 60 seconds; this bonus will be reset when a skill ends

rogue_2_relic_fight_108.name: 'Sui's Wrath'
rogue_2_relic_fight_108.description: The Feranmut lifts its head, heaven and earth cower in fear.
rogue_2_relic_fight_108.usage: Whenever you deploy a unit, deal 3000 Arts damage to a random enemy and the area around it
rogue_2_relic_fight_108.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 3 Specialist Operators

rogue_2_relic_fight_109.name: Assault Co-op - Sharp Blade
rogue_2_relic_fight_109.description: Use the sharpest spear to strike the hardest shield. I guarantee you that the shield will break first, trust me.
rogue_2_relic_fight_109.usage: Increases the ATK of Vanguard and Guard Operators by +8% for each Vanguard or Guard Operator in the combat squad

rogue_2_relic_fight_110.name: Fortification Co-op - Phalanx
rogue_2_relic_fight_110.description: Like a huge ship running over rubble.
rogue_2_relic_fight_110.usage: Increases the ATK of Defender and Supporter Operators by +8% for each Defender or Supporter Operator in the combat squad

rogue_2_relic_fight_111.name: Ranged Co-op - Remote Strike
rogue_2_relic_fight_111.description: If you can solve the problem from a reasonable distance, why do you have to literally butt heads?
rogue_2_relic_fight_111.usage: Increases the ATK of Medic and Sniper Operators by +8% for each Medic or Sniper Operator in the combat squad

rogue_2_relic_fight_112.name: Sabotage Co-op - Suppression
rogue_2_relic_fight_112.description: Don’t worry about accuracy. Take enough shots, and you’re guaranteed to land something!
rogue_2_relic_fight_112.usage: Increases the ASPD of Caster and Specialist Operators by +6 for each Caster or Specialist Operator in the combat squad

rogue_2_relic_fight_113.name: Coin-Operated Toy
rogue_2_relic_fight_113.description: No idea why anyone would like a design like this, but its overall concept is indeed praiseworthy—Just insert a coin, and even a statue will start moving. There is nothing truer in this world.
rogue_2_relic_fight_113.usage: For each 5 Originium Ingots in possession, all friendly units have +3 ASPD

rogue_2_relic_fight_114.name: Chivalric Commandments - New Edition
rogue_2_relic_fight_114.description: Taking solemn vows is a thing of the past. The spirit of modern knighthood requires more flexible displays. Go ahead and input your number in the communications device, and you too will be an honorary knight.
rogue_2_relic_fight_114.usage: For each 5 Originium Ingots in possession, all friendly units have +5 ASPD
rogue_2_relic_fight_114.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 40 Originium Ingots remaining

rogue_2_relic_fight_115.name: Spinach Pack
rogue_2_relic_fight_115.description: Many Cautus out there believe that popping the contents of this can into their mouths will grant them immense strength. The marketing's effectiveness is a classic success story in the industry.
rogue_2_relic_fight_115.usage: All friendly units have +60% ATK for one second after their skill becomes active

rogue_2_relic_fight_116.name: Wrath of Siracusans
rogue_2_relic_fight_116.description: The signature pasta dish of an 'authentic Siracusan restaurant' that once operated in the capital of Gaul. The dish's unique taste, and particularly its sauce, a blend of thick chocolate sauce and Originium Slug liver, earned the praise of many Gaulish nobles. Supposedly, though, this dish nearly caused a diplomatic crisis between Siracusa and Gaul.
rogue_2_relic_fight_116.usage: All friendly units have +100% ATK for one second after their skill becomes active

rogue_2_relic_fight_118.name: Ribbon of Honor
rogue_2_relic_fight_118.description: Numerous actors have played this character, yet none of them were able to save the character's dearest friend.
rogue_2_relic_fight_118.usage: All friendly units have +100% ATK when blocking only one enemy

rogue_2_relic_fight_119.name: 'End of Times'
rogue_2_relic_fight_119.description: As long as a new cycle has not been reached, there is still time to fix your mistakes.
rogue_2_relic_fight_119.usage: For one time only, if you would fail any battle other than the final battle of the area or a Leader battle, you instead gain +1 Life Point and advance to the next step instead of concluding the exploration
rogue_2_relic_fight_119.unlockCondDesc: Across all adventures, spend a total of 100 Originium Ingots at shops

rogue_2_relic_fight_120.name: Royal Alliance Treaty
rogue_2_relic_fight_120.description: The old Sarkaz courts sacrificed themselves to obtain their power. Ever since, the courts have come to terms with one another, banding together against their common enemy.
rogue_2_relic_fight_120.usage: All Operators no longer receive any damage from Sarkaz enemies

rogue_2_relic_fight_121.name: 'Flames of the Inquisition'
rogue_2_relic_fight_121.description: Because the evil creatures were born from the sea, they were afraid. Afraid of the flames that would never mix with the sea.
rogue_2_relic_fight_121.usage: Operators recover 2 SP when dealing damage to [Sea Monsters]
rogue_2_relic_fight_121.unlockCondDesc: In the 'Prospective Investment System,' reach an Investment Reserve Balance of 325

rogue_2_relic_fight_122.name: King's New Lance
rogue_2_relic_fight_122.description: Beautiful wishes made in dire straits can bring hope, even if they are not necessarily the truth.
rogue_2_relic_fight_122.usage: When Life Point is 1, all friendly units have +50 ASPD

rogue_2_relic_fight_123.name: 'Painful Happiness'
rogue_2_relic_fight_123.description: Oripathy is spreading among the troupe members. Some collapsed, some broke out crying, some were overjoyed, and some turned their attention to writing. It was at such a time that the young man received his coming-of-age present. He will sing his very last song as an actor.
rogue_2_relic_fight_123.usage: All enemy units have -15% HP and Movement Speed

rogue_2_relic_fight_124.name: Castle's Offspring
rogue_2_relic_fight_124.description: With enough time, this box will become a whole new stage.
rogue_2_relic_fight_124.usage: All Operators gain +300 DEF and +30 RES after being deployed for 100 seconds
rogue_2_relic_fight_124.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 80 Operators deployed in battle

rogue_2_relic_fight_125.name: 'Little Gran Faro'
rogue_2_relic_fight_125.description: The illumination device produced after reverse engineering the Eye of Iberia. It is powerful enough to penetrate layers of dark clouds, as well as temporarily repel powerful enemies.
rogue_2_relic_fight_125.usage: Deals Stun on all enemy units for 5 seconds every time an enemy unit enters the Protection Objective
rogue_2_relic_fight_125.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, lose a total of 125 Life Point

rogue_2_relic_fight_126.name: 'Memories of The Shard'
rogue_2_relic_fight_126.description: 'It has pierced Victoria's heart, and is watching the empire bleed.'
rogue_2_relic_fight_126.usage: Deals 3000 True Damage on all enemy units every time an enemy unit enters the Protection Objective

rogue_2_relic_fight_127.name: Distant Home's Guide
rogue_2_relic_fight_127.description: This ancient ring is actually said to be a special navigation device, used to find emergency supplies that the Ægir once secretly stashed in various spots across the ocean. Follow the ocean's currents, be guided by wind; your homeland will always continue to bestow gifts upon you.
rogue_2_relic_fight_127.usage: Designates one deployable tile at the beginning of battle; friendly units deployed on that tile will recover 1 SP per 2 seconds and 3% Max HP per second

rogue_2_relic_fight_128.name: Abandoned Banner
rogue_2_relic_fight_128.description: There is nothing special about this dismasted flag, but the Abyssal Hunters can use it to find combat supplies that the Ægir once secretly stashed in various spots across the ocean. They have no way of knowing what the ocean has forgiven, but there is no need for them to forgive. The fight never ends.
rogue_2_relic_fight_128.usage: Designates one deployable tile at the beginning of battle; friendly units deployed on that tile have +50% ATK and +50 ASPD
rogue_2_relic_fight_128.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure with at least 120 Operators deployed in battle

rogue_2_relic_fight_129.name: Medicine Sticks
rogue_2_relic_fight_129.description: In ancient times, whenever Great Yan's armies fought, they would march forward carrying these. Mulberry drew inspiration from this and made an edible plaster, excellent for working out the masseter muscle and revitalizing one's spirit.
rogue_2_relic_fight_129.usage: All Operators gain 2 layers of Shield when deployed

rogue_2_relic_fight_130.name: Hand of Purification
rogue_2_relic_fight_130.description: Where it is, dust is not.
rogue_2_relic_fight_130.usage: Bard, Phalanx Caster, and Therapist Operators deal 50% ATK as Arts damage to all enemies in their attack range

rogue_2_relic_fight_132.name: Fincatcher's Shawl
rogue_2_relic_fight_132.description: A shawl often worn by Iberian seamen when they went to hunt giant fins in the shallows, the unique texture and color making them blend in with the reef. The Rhodes Island Engineering Department designed a combat uniform with an optical camouflage effect based on this prototype, which is currently in the testing stage.
rogue_2_relic_fight_132.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Saint Iberia' once

rogue_2_relic_fight_133.name: Iron Guard - Moving Fortress
rogue_2_relic_fight_133.description: Nobody can break through their defenses, and even fewer are able to escape from their assault. If every combatant has a mission, then that mission is to change the situation on the battlefield the moment they enter the fray.
rogue_2_relic_fight_133.usage: Defender Operators have +100% ATK, +100% DEF, and +1 Block for 15 seconds after deployment
rogue_2_relic_fight_133.unlockCondDesc: Complete an adventure while having at least 3 Defender Operators

rogue_2_relic_fight_134.name: Hand of Pulverization
rogue_2_relic_fight_134.description: Your goal isn't just to hit the bullseye over and over.
rogue_2_relic_fight_134.usage: Artilleryman, Splash Caster, and Flinger Operators gain +15% ATK for every time they deal damage to the same unit, up to 150%; this bonus will reset if no damage is dealt for 5 seconds

rogue_2_relic_fight_135.name: Hand of Flowing Water
rogue_2_relic_fight_135.description: The ocean's flow never ceases, because it is always surging.
rogue_2_relic_fight_135.usage: Increases the SP recovery rate of Core Caster, Mystic Caster, and Summoner Operators by +0.5/s whenever they use a skill, up to 4 stacks

rogue_2_relic_fight_136.name: 'Glorious Kazimierz'
rogue_2_relic_fight_136.description: A Kazimierzian best-seller that adapts the deeds of the arena's brightest-shining knights into a novel. Nearl, who was exiled but returned to reclaim her laurels, occupies a considerable portion of its pages.
rogue_2_relic_fight_136.usage: Operators gain +70% ATK for 6 seconds after dodging

rogue_2_relic_fight_137.name: 'The Return'
rogue_2_relic_fight_137.description: This Kazimierzian best-seller is said to be a collective creation by fans. 'Nearl' has already become an amalgamation of many ideals and fantasies. 'For her, exile was not an escape. She came back, and stood alone against the era's torrents.'
rogue_2_relic_fight_137.usage: Operators gain +130% ATK for 6 seconds after dodging
rogue_2_relic_fight_137.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, clear a total of 40 battles

rogue_2_relic_fight_138.name: Convalescence Experience Card
rogue_2_relic_fight_138.description: A special service from the Convalescent Garden! Each Operator is entitled to one physiotherapy session from the Convalescent Garden before each of their field operations. Non-transferrable.
rogue_2_relic_fight_138.usage: All Operators gain +40 ASPD for 10 seconds after deployment

rogue_2_relic_fight_139.name: Convalescence Prime Membership
rogue_2_relic_fight_139.description: A special service collaboratively provided by the Convalescent Garden and the Medical Department! Each Operator is entitled to one comprehensive physical and psychological assessment, as well as a physiotherapy session. Afterwards, they can also taste Podenco's homemade flower cakes.
rogue_2_relic_fight_139.usage: All Operators gain +70 ASPD for 10 seconds after deployment
rogue_2_relic_fight_139.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Tidelinked Immortal' once

rogue_2_relic_fight_140.name: Old George Nutritional Paste
rogue_2_relic_fight_140.description: This poor-tasting fortified nutritional supplement was originally a 'dietary supplement' periodically provided to Columbian Pioneers, but after extensive marketing, it suddenly became a 'beauty product' beloved by nobles.
rogue_2_relic_fight_140.usage: Operators have increased ATK proportional to how high their HP is, up to a maximum of +30% ATK at 100% HP
rogue_2_relic_fight_140.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat a total of 500 'Baleful Broodlings'

rogue_2_relic_fight_141.name: Emergency Active Agent
rogue_2_relic_fight_141.description: An injection commonly used in Rim Billiton's local mines. Its strong active ingredient can stimulate the workers' senses and ensure their work efficiency in extreme environments. Life and engineering both have deadlines, and for them, this is simply a multiple-choice question.
rogue_2_relic_fight_141.usage: Operators have increased ASPD proportional to how low their HP is, up to a maximum of +60 ASPD at 30% HP
rogue_2_relic_fight_141.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, allow 15 [Skimming Sea Drifters] to enter the Objective Point

rogue_2_relic_fight_144.name: King's Buckler
rogue_2_relic_fight_144.description: Keep your eyes straight ahead, and let your stalwart heart resist all hardship.
rogue_2_relic_fight_144.usage: When Life Point is at 1, all Operators have +2 Block

rogue_2_relic_fight_145.name: King's Staff
rogue_2_relic_fight_145.description: Let go of worthless pomp and treat others with kindness. They will no doubt return in kind.
rogue_2_relic_fight_145.usage: When Life Point is at 1, all Operators recover an additional 1 SP every 2 seconds

rogue_2_relic_fight_146.name: King's Crown
rogue_2_relic_fight_146.description: O Nameless King, may you continue to bless Iberia, even should your kingdom fall to ruin.
