rogue_2_relic_fight_146.usage: When Life Point is at 1, all friendly units have +50% ATK, increased to +150% ATK if you have collected 3 or more King's Collectibles

rogue_2_relic_fight_147.name: 'Glory Pack'
rogue_2_relic_fight_147.description: A special betting method set up by the organizers for the duration of the knight competition season. Choose from a variety of complementary betting packages to minimize your losses on any particular match.
rogue_2_relic_fight_147.usage: When an Operator is defeated, it will Stun all enemies in the four adjacent tiles for 6 seconds
rogue_2_relic_fight_147.unlockCondDesc: Select 'Support Squad' and complete your adventure.

rogue_2_relic_fight_148.name: Timeworn Poetry Strips
rogue_2_relic_fight_148.description: 'Drunk far beyond all mounts that list the realm, all beings take on souls as they demand.'
rogue_2_relic_fight_148.usage: Summons will no longer use Deployment slots
rogue_2_relic_fight_148.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat the Leader 'Lingering Pathshaper' once

rogue_2_relic_fight_149.name: Derivative Terminal - Supercharged Mod
rogue_2_relic_fight_149.description: A product of Raythean Industries. The latest remote-control operation terminal, capable of connecting to the signals of most existing remotely-operated units on its own, complete with customization options and performance upgrades. Not yet available on the market.
rogue_2_relic_fight_149.usage: Summons have +30% HP, +30% ATK, and +30 ASPD

rogue_2_relic_fight_151.name: Uncle Vought Total Care Kit
rogue_2_relic_fight_151.description: A complete care kit produced by the Columbian old salon product manufacturer, 'Uncle Vought.' Provence has modeled for this product. 'Take good care of your tail and your ears - after all, they're your second face.'
rogue_2_relic_fight_151.usage: All friendly ranged units take 40% less Elemental Damage
rogue_2_relic_fight_151.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, allow 5 [Skimming Sea Drifters] to enter the Objective Point

rogue_2_relic_fight_152.name: Ursus Felt Rug
rogue_2_relic_fight_152.description: The people of Ursus will spread this special felt rug across their cellars when storing grains for the winter, in order to absorb water and prevent moisture. When the cellar becomes a hiding place, it also helps shelter the occupants from the wind and snow for a while.
rogue_2_relic_fight_152.usage: All friendly melee units take 40% less Elemental Damage
rogue_2_relic_fight_152.unlockCondDesc: Across multiple adventures, defeat a total of 200 'Baleful Broodlings'

rogue_2_treasure.name: Drifting Cache
rogue_2_treasure.usage: A few small items can be found inside.

endingDetailList.text: You let the wandering jazz player try his inspiration <color=#ffb525>{0}</color> times.
In the end, he must admit he has had a taste of defeat thanks to you.
You carefully admired the oil painting.
You asked the person their name.
You opened the doors and walked in.
You listened to the old lady's stories <color=#ffb525>{0}</color> times.
You dived into the heap of trash <color=#ffb525>{0}</color> times.
You defeated the Big Sad Lock.

rogue_2_treasure.name: Brute force it with a weapon
rogue_2_treasure.usage: I'll open this damn thing, even if nothing's inside!

sanRanges.description: <Luminous> The light radiates, and shadows cower.
<Flickering> The candlelight sways, light and shadow interweave.
<Dim> Behind a speck of light, the shadow follows.
<Extinguished> No more flame, no more light.

rogue_2_outbuff_6.rawDesc: Increases Living Cells acquisition rate by +5%

rogue_2_outbuff_8.rawDesc: When using the People-Oriented Squad, you may choose 1 additional reward at Safe House nodes

rogue_2_outbuff_9.rawDesc: After rolling a die at the Rogue Trader, gain a chance to purchase goods at 80% price

rogue_2_outbuff_12.rawDesc: After rolling a die at the Rogue Trader, gain a chance to purchase goods at 60% price (similar effects do not stack)

rogue_2_outbuff_16.rawDesc: When using the People-Oriented Squad, reduces the Hope cost of promoting Operators by 1

rogue_2_outbuff_17.rawDesc: All friendly units gain +2% Max HP

rogue_2_outbuff_18.rawDesc: All friendly units gain +3% Max HP

rogue_2_outbuff_19.rawDesc: Increases Living Cells acquisition rate by +5%

rogue_2_outbuff_25.rawDesc: When Life Point is greater than 10, a perfect clear grants +1 Objective Shield

rogue_2_outbuff_27.rawDesc: When Life Point is greater than 8, a perfect clear grants +1 Objective Shield (similar effects do not stack)

rogue_2_outbuff_30.rawDesc: When using the Mind Over Matter Squad, you may choose 1 additional reward when completing Regional Commissions

rogue_2_outbuff_35.rawDesc: When using the Mind Over Matter Squad, increases the likelihood of obtaining a collectible after battle

rogue_2_outbuff_36.rawDesc: When rolling the die upon entering a new floor, if you would otherwise obtain a debuff effect, you may spend a Die Roll to reroll the result (once per exploration)

rogue_2_outbuff_41.rawDesc: The Resourceful Squad starts with an 8-sided die

rogue_2_outbuff_44.rawDesc: Unlocks the 'Duck Lord's Golden Brick' collectible

rogue_2_outbuff_45.rawDesc: When rolling a 1 in the 'Wish Fulfilled' node, you may spend a Die Roll to reroll the result (once per node)

rogue_2_outbuff_46.rawDesc: The Resourceful Squad gains +1 Die Roll when entering a new floor

rogue_2_outbuff_49.rawDesc: Increases Living Cells acquisition rate by +10%

endingText.summaryDiceResultGood: Fortune is like a close friend, always by your side
endingText.summaryDiceResultNormal: Fate is always fair, like the scales of justice
endingText.summaryDiceResultBad: Misfortune is like a rope, never letting go
endingText.summaryCommuDesc: You had 'friendly' dealings with Cannot, taking away goods with total value:
endingText.summaryHiddenDesc: You entered the Indigo Cradle by accident and experienced a strange adventure:
endingText.summaryKnightDesc: You encountered the Tide-hunt Knight and bore witness to his exploits:
endingText.summaryGoldDesc: You found a strange Ægir printer, and inserting a coin gave you joy:
endingText.summaryPracticeDesc: You have worked hard to gain the rewards of your trials:
endingText.summaryCommuEmptyDesc: Taking unfinished food is a good habit, isn't it?
endingText.summaryKnightPassedDesc: You faced the knight's charge head-on.
endingText.summaryKnightNotPassedDesc: You could not see the knight's story through the end.
endingText.summaryGoldHighDesc: What a wonderful printer, isn't it?
endingText.summaryPracticeHighDesc: You are filled with hope and aspiration.
endingText.summaryPracticeLowDesc: You got something out of it, didn't you?
